manzils.text: Gaofu [alabo yu yige zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhi dao qi yi]. Yi zhe bu guangrong de “gulanjing” fashi!
Bu, tamen dui chuzi tamen ben zu de yi wei jinggao zhe [mu sheng] jianglin tamen gandao jingya. Bu xinyang zhe shuo:“Zhe shi yi jian qi shi!
Nandao women si hou bian cheng chentu shi,[women zhen de hai yao bei fuhuo ma?] Zhe shi yi zhong miaomang de huanyuan [fuhuo].”
Wo que zhi dadi shourongle tamen zhong de duoshao ren [siren], wo youyi bu shou baohu de tian jing [“shou baohu de xian pai”].
Bu, dang zhenli jianglin tamen shi, tamen fouren, yin'er tamen xianrule hunluan zhong [buneng bian zhen wei].
Nandao tamen meiyou guancha zai tamen shangmian de tiankong, wo zenyang jianzao ta, zhuangshi ta bing shi ta meiyou quexian [liefeng] ma?
Wo ceng zhankai dadi, zai qizhong wengu de anzhi qun shan, shi ge zhong meili de zhiwu shengzhang qizhong,
gong mei ge gui xin [an la] de puren guancha he lingwu.
Wo cong tiankong jiangxia jixiang de yushui, jie ci er shi guoyuan he wugu shengzhang,
[bing shengzhang chu] gaoda de ye zao shu, jie chu cheng chuan de ye zao,
zuowei [wo de] pu renmen de jiyang. Wo jie ci er shi kusi de dadi fusu.[Siren de] fuhuo jiushi zheyang.
Zai tamen [mai jia de yi jiaotu] zhiqian fouren [shizhemen] de you: Nu ha de zuren [zhu], la si de jumin, sa mu de ren,
a de ren, falao, lu te de tongbaomen,
Conglin de jumin he tu ba de zuren, tamen dou fourenguo [tamen de] shizhemen, suoyi, wo jinggao [tamen] de xingfa shixianle.
Wo yin zuichu de chuangzao er pijuan ma? Bu, tamen reng zai huaiyi xin de chuangzao [fuhuo].
Wo que yi chuangzao ren, wo zhidao ta [ren] xinzhong de yinsi wangxiang, wo bi ta de mingmai hai jiejin ta.
Dang zuo zai [ren] youbian de yi wei [jilu shangong] he zuo zai zuobian de yi wei [jilu e xing] jilu de tianshi jilu [zhu][ren de xingwei] shi,
ta [ren] mei shuo yiju hua, ta pangbian jiu youyi wei jianshi zhe [tianshi] zai jilu [ren dao fayu nianling hou, tianshi fang kaishi jilu qi shan e].
Siwang de hunmi jiang jieshi zhenli,[you hua sheng shuo]:“Zhe jiushi ni chang taobi de.”
Haojiao yi chui xiang, na jiushi jinggao shixian zhi ri [fuhuo ri].
Mei geren daolai shi, jiang youyi wei qugan [ta] de tianshi he yi wei jianzheng [ta] de tianshi peiban er lai.
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Ni que yi hushi ci shi,[xianzai] wo yi jie kai ni de zheyan, jinri ni de yanguang shi ruili de.”
Ta de peiban zhe [tianshi] jiang shuo:“Zhe shi wo [wei ta] zuo de jilu.”
[You hua sheng mingling liang wei peiban de tianshi shuo]:“Ni lia ying touru huo yu de shi: Mei ge wang'enfuyi zhe, wangu zhe,
zu'ai xingshan zhe, guofen [chaoyue fadu] zhe, huaiyi zhe,
ji bai an la, you bai qita shenling zhe, ni lia ying ba zhe zhong ren touru yanli de xingfa zhong.”
Ta de [emo] huoban jiang shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo meiyou shi ta panni, er shi ta ziji xianrule shenyuan de mi wu zhong.”
Ta [an la] jiang shuo:“Nimen buyao zai wo zheli zhenglun, wo que yi shixian jinggaoguo nimen.
Wo de panci shi jue buneng genggai de, wo jue bu kuidai [wo de] pu renmen.”
Zai na ri, wo [an la] jiang dui huo yu shuo:“Ni tian man [zhu man]le ma?” Huo yu jiang shuo:“Hai you geng duo de ren [yao lai] ma [zhu]?”
Leyuan jiang bei dai dao jingwei zhe fujin, li de bu yuan.
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Zhe [leyuan] jiushi nimen suo bei xunuo de, zhe shi ci gei mei ge chang gui xin [an la] zhe he zunshou [yisilan jiao jiaoyi jiaogui] zhe de.
Fan anzhong jingwei pu ci zhi zhu [an la] bing daizhe yi ke gui xin [an la] de xin er lai zhe,
nimen ping'an jinru leyuan ba! Zhe shi yongsheng kaishi zhi ri.”
Fanshi tamen xiang yao de, tamen zai leyuan li dou neng dedao, erqie zai wo zheli hai you geng duo [geng hao] de [dai ci wu].

Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, naxie shidai [de shili] bi tamen de geng qiangda.[Dang wo de xingfa lailin shi], tamen ceng zai gedi luan pao [xunzhao binan suo]. Nandao tamen neng zhaodao renhe binan suo ma?
Dui youxin lingwu zhe, huo zhuanxin qingting zhe, ci zhong que youyi zhong jiaohui.
Wo que yi zai liu rinei chuangzao tiandi wanwu, wo sihao bu juede pijuan.
Duiyu tamen suo wangyan de, ni [mu sheng] dang rennai. Ni dang zai ri chu zhiqian [chen li] he riluo zhiqian [bu li] zanmei songyang ni de zhu [zhu][an la],

ni dang zai yejian de yibufen shijian [hun li he xiao li] zansong ta, zhuming bai hou ye ying zansong ta [ru zhuming bai hou li sheng xing bai, fu gong bai, nian “shu bu ha nan la (zanmei an la chaojue), ai lei ha mu du ling la (yiqie zansong, quan gui an la), an la hu ai ke bai er (an la zhi da)”].
Ni dang qingting jiaohan zhe cong jin chu jiaohan zhi ri [fuhuo ri].
Dang tamen tingjian baohan zhenli de haojiao chui xiang zhi ri, na jiushi cong fenmu chulai zhi ri.
Wo dique neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si. Wei wo [an la] zheli shi zuihou de guisu.
Dang dadi polie, tamen congmang [cong fenmu zhong] chulai zhi ri, na jiushi jihe, na dui wo shi rongyi de.
Wo zui zhidao tamen suo wangyan de, ni [mu sheng] buyao qiangpo tamen [xinyang], ni dang yi “gulanjing” jiaohui weiju wo de jinggao zhe.
Yi sanbu de feng,
zaizhe han yu de yun,
ziyou piaoliu [de chuanbo],
feng [an la zhi] ming fen pei [jiyang, yushui he qita enci wu] zhe [tianshi] fashi!
Fan xunuo nimen de [houshi de fuhuo, shan jiang e fa deng] dou shi zhenshi de,
shenpan que shi yao fasheng de.
Yi you guidao de tianti fashi!
Nimen [dui mu sheng he “gulanjing”] que shi ge zhi yi ci de.
[Genju an la de panjue he qian ding] beili [mu sheng he “gulanjing”] zhe beilile.
Gai zao qianze de shuohuang zhe!
Tamen [shuohuang zhe] chang chenni yu yumei de shuohuang zhong.
Tamen chang wen:“Shenpan ri zai shenme shihou?”
Na shi tamen zai huo yu shang shouxing zhi ri.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen changshi nimen [bei shaozhuo] de xingfa ba! Zhe jiushi nimen [shengqian] yaoqiu zaori shixian de xingfa.”
Jingwei zhe bi jiang zhu zai leyuan he quanshui pang,
jieshou tamen de zhu ciyu tamen de, yinwei tamen ciqian que shi xingshan zhe.
Yeli, tamen jingchang shao shui [zhu][yong da bufen shijian qiqiu an la, ru libai];
liming qian, tamen jiu [xiang an la] qiurao.
Zai tamen de caichan zhong, qiqiu zhe he pinmin jun you fen'e.
Dui duxin [an la] zhe, dadishang you xuduo jixiang,
nimen zishen zhong yeyou xuduo jixiang. Nandao nimen meiyou guancha ma?
Tianshang you nimen de jiyang he nimen suo bei xunuo de yiqie.
Yi tiandi de zhu [an la] fashi! Zhe [nimen suo bei xunuo de] que shi zhenshi de, youru nimen jiang shihua yiyang [zhenshi].
Yi bu la xin de guike [ji bu li lei tianshi he lingwai liang wei tianshi] de gushi daoda ni [mu sheng]le ma?
Dangshi, tamen [san wei tianshi] jinqu jian ta [yi bu la xin]. Tamen shuo:“Zhu ni ping'an!” Ta shuo:“[Ye] zhu nimen ping'an!”[Ta hai shuo]:“Nimen shi wo bu renshi de mosheng ren.”
Ranhou, ta qiaoqiao dao ta de jiaren nali, jiezhe bian na lai yi zhi kao niudu [jushuo yi bu la xin shengren de caichan da bufen shi niu].
Ta ba na niudu fang dao tamen mianqian, ta shuo:“Nimen bu hui chi ma?”
[Yinwei tamen bu chi kao niudu] ta gandao youdian haipa tamen. Tamen shuo:“Ni buyao haipa.” Tamen yi yige [dui an la ji qi zongjiao] congmin de erzi xiang ta baoxi.
Ta de qizi jiaorangzhe zou lai, dazhe ta de lian shuo:“Wo shi yige buneng shengyu de lao fule.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni de zhu [an la] shi zheyang shuo de. Ta [an la] que shi zui ruizhi de, quanzhi de.”
Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Shizhemen [tianshi] a! Nimen de shiming shi shenme?”
Tamen shuo:“Women fengming qu chengzhi yiqun fanzui de minzhong,
women jiang jiangxia shaoguo de niantu ban de shi kuai chengzhi tamen,
[naxie shi kuai] zai ni de zhu nali shi wei chengfa guofen zhe [chaoyue fadu zhe] er dashang laoyin de.”
Wo jiuchule chengzhong de xinshi,
dan wo zai chengzhong zhi faxian yijia musilin [lu te shengren he ta de liang ge nu'er].
Wo zai nali gei weiju tongku de xingfa zhe liu xiale yi zhong jixiang [sihai].
Zai mu sa de gushi zhong [yeyou yi zhong jixiang]. Dangshi, wo pai ta daizhe yi zhong mingzheng qu jian falao.
Dan ta [falao] yizhang ta de quanshi [jundui] beiqi ta [mu sa]. Ta [falao] shuo:“[Ni shi] yige moshu shi huo fengzi.”
Suoyi, wo chengzhile ta he ta de jundui, wo ba tamen reng jin dahai zhong [yan si], yinwei ta [falao] shi ying shou qianze de.
Zai a de ren de gushi zhong [yeyou yi zhong jixiang]. Dangshi, wo pai huimie xing de kuangfeng chengfa tamen.
Fanshi kuangfeng jingguo zhi chu, quanbu hui wei suipian.
Zai sa mu de ren de gushi zhong [yeyou yi zhong jixiang]. Dangshi, you hua sheng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zhanshi xiangshou ba!”
Dan tamen weikang tamen de zhu de mingling, suoyi, pili sheng zai tamen qinyan mudu xia xijile tamen.
Yinci, tamen zhan bu qilai, ye buneng zijiu.
Zai tamen zhiqian,[wo ceng huimiele] nu ha de zuren. Tamen shi beini de minzhong.
Wo yi wo de quanli jianzaole tian, wo que shi wanwu de chuangzao zhe.
Wo zhankaile da di. Wo shi duome zhuoyue de zhankai zhe a!
Wo ba mei zhong wu dou zaocheng liangxing de, yibian nimen sikao [an la de enhui].
[Ni shuo]:“Nimen gankuai tao gui an la ba [cong jiang zao an la de chengfa tao xiang huoqu an la de kuanshu he ci min——yisilan jiao]! Wo que shi ta paiqian gei nimen de tanshuai de jinggao zhe [zhu].
Nimen buyao ji bai an la, you bai qita shenling, wo que shi ta paiqian gei nimen de tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Tamen de qian ren yeshi zheyang, mei dang you shizhe lailin tamen, tamen bi [dui ta] shuo:“[Ni shi] yige moshu shi huo fengzi.”
Nandao tamen [qian ren] yi ci zhufu zhexie ren [gu lai shen de yi jiaotu] ma? Qishi, tamen shi panni de minzhong.
Ni [mu sheng] dang bi kai tamen [gu lai shen de yi jiaotu], ni shi bu shou zebei de [yinwei ni yi xiang tamen chuandale an la de qishi].
Ni dang [yi “gulanjing”] jiaohui [renlei], yinwei jiaohui dui xinshimen que shi youyi de.
Wo [an la] chuangzao jingling he renlei, mudi shi rang tamen chongbai wo.
Wo buyao tamen de renhe gongyang, wo buyao tamen gong wo yinshi.
An la que shi [wanwu] zui hao de gongji zhe, que shi zui you quanli de, que shi zui qiang da de [zhu].
Bu yi zhe bi jiang zaoshou tamen xiri de huobanmen suo zaoshou de xingfa, suoyi, jiao tamen buyao cuicu wo zaori shixian xingfa.
Bu xinyang zhe bei jinggao de rizi lailin shi, tamen [bu xinyang zhe] jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Yi shan fashi!
Yi jilu zai zhankai de yangpi zhi shang de jingdian [“gulanjing”] fashi!
Yi renlei chaojin de tian fang fashi!
Yi gaosong de tianqiong fashi!
Yi wangyang dahai fashi [huo yi fuhuo ri bei dian shao de dahai fashi]!
Ni de zhu de xingfa kending shi yao lailin de,
renhe ren dou buneng dikang ta.
Dangtian ti [kongbu de] zhendong zhi ri,
qun shan jiang bei yi hui.
Zai na ri, fouren zhenli zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Yinwei tamen zai wang tan zhong qule.
Dang tamen bei qiangxing tui ru huo yu zhi ri,
[you hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Zhe jiushi nimen [shengqian] suo fouren de huo yu.
Zhe shi moshu ne? Haishi nimen kan bujian?
Nimen changshi huoxing ba! Wulun nimen neng renshou, haishi buneng renshou, dui nimen dou shi yiyang de. Nimen zhi shou nimen suo fanzui e de huan bao.”
Jingwei zhe bi zai leyuan he enze zhong,
[tamen] xinxi yu tamen de zhu ciyu tamen de [enhui]. Tamen de zhu yi zhengjiu tamen tuoli huo yu de xingfa.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen yin nimen suo zuo de shangong yukuai di chihe ba!”
[Tamen] kao zai cheng pai de bao yi shang, wo jiang baijing mei mu xianshu di meinu zuo tamen de qizi.

Fan ziji xinyang, qi zisun ye tong tamen yiqi xinyang zhe, wo jiang shi tamen de zisun [zai leyuan li] yu tamen tuanju [zhu 1], wo bu hui jianshao tamen de renhe shangong [zhu 2]. Mei ren dou yingdui ziji suo zuo de shi fuze.
Wo jiang ba tamen xiang yao de shuiguo he roushi ci gei tamen.
Tamen jiang zai leyuan li huxiang chuandi jiubei [jingjiu],[tamen] bu hui yinci [yinjiu] kou chu hui yan, ye bu hui yinci [yinjiu] er fanzui [zai leyuan li yinjiu shi hefa de].
Tamen de [nan] tongpu zai pangbian fushi tamen, naxie tongpu youru bang ke li de zhenzhu.
Tamen bici zou lai, huxiang xunwen.
Tamen shuo:“Yiqian, women dique wei women de jiaren weiju [an la de xingfa],
dan [xianzai] an la yi shi en gei women, bing zhengjiu women tuolile huo yu de xingfa.
Yiqian, women dique chang qiqiu ta. Ta que shi ren'ai de, te ci de.”
Ni [mu sheng] dang [yi yisilan jiao] jiaohui [renlei]. Ping ni de zhu de enhui, ni ji bushi zhanbu zhe, ye bushi fengzi.
Huoxu tamen yao shuo:“[Ta] shige shiren, women dengdai ta [mu sheng] zao buxing.”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen dengdai ba! Wo dique ye tong nimen yiqi dengdai.”
Shi tamen de lizhi jiao tamen ruci wangyan ne? Haishi tamen shi panni de minzhong?
Nandao tamen yao shuo:“Ta [mu sheng] weizao ta [“gulanjing”]?” Bu, shi tamen bu xinyang.
Jiaru tamen shi chengshi zhe, jiao tamen zuochu [yu “gulanjing”] tongyang de jing wen lai!
Shi tamen cong wu dao you bei chuangzao ne? Haishi tamen jiushi chuangzao zhe?
Nandao tamen chuangzaole tiandi ma? Bu, shi tamen bu duxin [an la].
Shi tamen yongyou ni de zhu de baozang ne? Haishi tamen you quan weisuoyuwei?
Nandao tamen youyi ba ti zi neng [deng tian] qieting [tianshimen de tanhua] ma?[Yaoshi zheyang], rang tamen de qieting zhe na chu mingzheng lai ba!
Nandao nuhai gui ta [an la] er nanhai gui nimen ma?
Nandao ni [mu sheng] xiang tamen suoquguo [chuanjiao de] baochou, yin'er tamen wei nashui fudan tai zhong ma?
Nandao tamen zhidao wei jian zhi wu, yin'er tamen neng ba ta jilu xialai ma?
Nandao tamen xiang yinmou pohai [ni] ma? Bu xinyang zhe bi zi zhong qi ji.
Chu an la wai, nandao tamen hai you ying shou chongbai de zhu ma? Zanmei an la chaojue! Ta chaojue yu tamen suo chongbai de [ouxiang].
Jiaru tamen neng kanjian yikuai tian diao xialai, tamen bi shuo:“[Zhe zhishi] yipian nong yun.”
Ni bie li tamen! Zhidao tamen zaoyu tamen bei zhen yun de rizi.
Zai na ri, tamen de jimou dui tamen jiang hao wu yichu, tamen ye de bu dao renhe yuanzhu.
Ciqian, bu yi zhe hai yao shou ling yi zhong xingfa [zhu][zai chenshi suo zaoshou de zainan he fenmu zhong shenwen shi de xingfa], dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
Ni [mu sheng] dang naixin dengdai ni de zhu de panjue, yinwei ni que shi zai wo de juangu zhi xia de. Ni qichuang shi ying zanmei songyang ni de zhu;
zai yejian he xingchen moluo shi, ni ye ying zansong ta.
Yi moluo shi de xingchen fashi!
Nimen de tongban [mu sheng] ji meiyou mi wu, ye meiyou fancuo.
Ta wei ping siyu er yan.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] zhishi tasuo feng dao de qishi.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi [an la tongguo] qiang youli zhe [ji bu li lei tianshi] jiaoshou ta de.
[Ji bu li lei tianshi] shi chunjie de, da dao liao jinhu wanmei.
Ta [ji bu li lei tianshi] zai dipingxian de zuigao chu,
ranhou, ta xiajiang bing zhujian jiejin.
Ta xiangju liang gong zhi chang, huo geng jin.
Ta [an la] ba ta yao qishi de [tongguo ji bu li lei tianshi] qishi ta de puren [mu sheng].
Ta [mu sheng] de xin meiyou fouren ziji suo jian de.
Nandao nimen yao tong ta [mu sheng] zhenglun ta [sheng xiao] suo jian de ma?
Ta [mu sheng] que yi kanjian ta [ji bu li lei tianshi] di er ci xiajiang [zhi ling yici, bingfei sheng xiao na yici],
zai wujin [wu ren neng tongguo] de suanzao shu pang,
suanzao shu pang you yong ju de leyuan.
Dang suanzao shu zhegaile ying zhegai zhi wu shi,
[na shi mu sheng] mu wei xie shi, ye wei guofen [kan bu gai kan de].
Ta [mu sheng] que yi kanjian ta de zhu [an la] de yixie zuida de jixiang.
Nimen xiangguo ma? La te he ou zai [zhu][a wei bo ren ceng chongbaiguo de liang ge ouxiang],
yiji di san ge——ma na [a wei bo ren ceng chongbaiguo de ling yige ouxiang].
Nandao nanxing gui nimen, er nuxing gui ta [an la] ma?
Ruguo zheyang, zhe que shi zui bu gongping de fenpei.

Zhexie ouxiang zhishi nimen he nimen de zuxian suo qu de mingcheng eryi, an la bing wei dui ci jiang shi renhe zhengju. Tamen zhi shuncong caixiang he siyu, jinguan zhengdao que yi cong tamen de zhu jianglin tamen.
Nandao ren xiang yao shenme jiu you she me ma?
Houshi he jinshi dou shi an la de.
Tianshang you xuduo tianshi, tamen de qiuqing hao wu yichu, chufei an la yunxu tamen wei tasuo yiyu zhe he xiyue zhe qiuqing zhihou.
Bu xinyang houshi zhe, tamen dique yi nuxing de mingzichenghu tianshimen.
Tamen dui ci hao wu zhishi, tamen zhi shuncong caixiang, er caixiang jue buneng tidai zhenli.
Fan beiqi wo de jiaohui [“gulanjing”] er zhi zhuiqiu jinshi shenghuo zhe, ni dang bi kai tamen.
Zhe shi tamen zhishi de zuigao xiandu. Ni de zhu dique zui zhidao shei shi mishi zhengdao zhe, ye zui zhidao shei shi zunxing zhengdao zhe.

Tiandi jian de yiqie dou shi an la de.[Fuhuo ri], ta jiang yi zuo'e zhe suo zuo de zui'e huan bao zuo'e zhe [ru zai huo yu li chengfa tamen], jiang yi xingshan zhe suo zuo de zui hao shangong baochou xingshan zhe [ru rang tamen zai leyuan li xiangle].

Fan yuan bi dazui [jian 6:152-153] He jianyin [zhu], zhi fan xiao zui zhe, ni de zhu que shi zui kuanrong de. Dang ta cong dadi chuangzao nimen [ru a dan shengren] shi, dang nimen haishi tai'er zai nimen de mu fu zhong shi, ta shi zui zhidao nimen de. Suoyi, nimen buyao zi cheng chunjie, ta zui zhidao shei shi jingwei zhe.
Ni [mu sheng] zhuyi dao nage beili [yisilan jiao] de ren ma?
Ta shaowei shishe jiu linse [zhu].
Nandao ta zhidao wei jian zhi wu, yin'er ta neng kanjian [zhenli he jieju] ma?
Nandao mei ren gaosuguo ta mu sa de jingdian zhong suo jizai de ma?
Yiji zunxing suoyou zhuming de yi bu la xin de jingdian zhong suo jizai de ma?
Yige fu zui zhe bu fudan bieren de zui'e.
Mei ren dou jiang huode ziji suo fendou de baochou [zhong gua de gua, zhong dou de dou].
[Fuhuo ri] ta fendou de jieguo jiang bei kanjian,
ranhou, ta jiang huode zui wanquan de baochou.
Ni de zhu [an la] que shi [wanwu] zuizhong de guisu.
Ta [an la] dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] ren xiao, ta dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] ren ku.
Ta dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] ren si, ta dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] rensheng.
Ta dique yong shechu de yidi jingye chuangzaole pei'ou——nanxing he nuxing.
[Fuhuo ri] ta dique yi zaizao wei jiren.
Ta dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] ren fuyu, ta dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] ren manyi.
Ta dique shi tianlangxing [a wei bo ren ceng chongbaiguo de xing] de zhu.
Ta [an la] dique huimiele yiqian de a de ren,
yiji sa mu de ren, yige ye meiyou liu xia.
Yiqian,[ta ceng huimiele] nu ha de zuren. Tamen que shi zui bu yi de, que shi zui panni de [tamen bu fucong an la ji qi shizhe nu ha].

Nimen weihe bu wei an la zhi dao shiyong ne [zhu]? Tiandi jian de yiqie [yichan] dou shi an la de. Nimen zhong gongke [mai jia] qian shiyong bing canzhan zhe, tong qita ren [gongke mai jia hou shiyong bing canzhan zhe] shi bu xiangdeng de. Zhexie ren [gongke mai jia qian shiyong bing canzhan zhe] bi cihou shiyong bing canzhan zhe juyou geng gao de pinji. Dan an la dui mei zhong ren dou xu gei youmei de baochou. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi che zhi de.
Shei wei an la [zhi dao] juanxian yi bi shan kuan, ta [an la] bi jiabei ci hai shei,[ciwai] ta hai jiang huode fengfu de baochou [leyuan].

Zai na ri, ni jiang kanjian nannu xinshimen de guanghui zai tamen de qianmian he youbian shanyao.[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen jintian de xixun shi:[Nimen jiang jinru] zhu heliuguo de leyuan, yong ju qizhong. Zhe que shi weida de chenggong.”

Zai na ri, nannu wei xinzhe [zhu] jiang dui xinshimen shuo:“Qing nimen deng deng women! Rang women zhan yidian er nimen de guanghui ba!” You hua sheng [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen huiqu xunqiu guanghui ba!” Yushi, tamen [xinshi yu wei xinzhe] zhi jian mashang shu qile yi du qiang, qiang shang you daomen, men nei you enhui, men wai you xingfa.

Wei xinzhe jiang hanjiao xinshimen:“Nandao women yuanlai bu shi tong nimen zai yiqi de ma?” Tamen [xinshi] jiang shuo:“Shi de, dan nimen shi nimen ziji xianrule mihuo zhong, nimen dengdai [women miewang], huaiyi [liu da xinyang deng], wangxiang qipianle nimen, zhidao an la de mingling lailin. Pian zei [emo] ceng jie an la de mingyi qipian nimen.
Jintian, nimen [wei xinzhe] de fajin bu bei jieshou, bu xinyang zhe de fajin ye bu bei jieshou [zhu]. Nimen de guisu shi huo yu, na shi zui shiyi nimen juzhu di difang. Guisu zhen elie!”

Nandao huan wei dao xinshimen xuxin zan nian an la he ta suo jiang shi de zhenli de shijian ma [zhu]? Yizhi tamen bu hui xiang yiqian shou ci jingdian zhe [you jing ren] yiyang, shijian dui tamen tuo chang le, tamen de xin jiu hui bian ying ma? Tamen zhong you xuduo ren shi beini zhe.
Nimen dang zhi dao, an la shi kusi de dadi fusu. Wo que yi wei nimen chanming xuduo qishi, yibian nimen mingli.
Hao shi de nannu, yiji wei an la [zhi dao] juanxian yi bi shan kuan zhe, ta [an la] bi jiabei ci hai tamen,[ciwai] tamen hai jiang huode fengfu de baochou [leyuan].

Fan xinyang an la ji qi shizhemen de ren, zai tamen de zhu kan lai, zhexie ren que shi chengshi zhe [ru zuizao xinyang shizhemen bing zhuisui tamen de ren] he xunjiao zhe, tamen jiang huode tamen de baochou he guangming. Fan bu xinyang bing fouren wo de jixiang zhe, zhexie ren shi huo yu de fanren.

Nimen dang zhidao, jinshi shenghuo zhishi yi zhong youxi, yule, zhuangshi he nimen bici jian de kuayao, yiji caichan he ernu zhi duo de jingsai. Zhe youru xia yu, yushui shi zuowu shengzhang, shi gengzhong zhe kuaile, ranhou, zuowu kuweile, ni kanjian ta bian cheng huangse, ranhou diaoluo. Zai houshi you cong an la jiang shi [gei bu xinyang zhe he zuo'e zhe] de yanxing, you cong an la jiang shi [gei xinshi he xingshan zhe] de kuanshu he xiyue. Jinshi shenghuo zhishi xuhuan de xiangshou [zhu].

Nimen dang zhengxian xunqiu nimen de zhu [an la] de kuanshu [zhu] he leyuan, na leyuan de kuandu yu tiandi de kuandu yiyang, na shi wei xinyang an la ji qi shizhemen de ren zhunbei de, na shi an la de enhui, ta ba ta ciyu tasuo yiyu zhe. An la shi you zhongda enhui de zhu.

Fanshi da dishang he nimen zishen suo zaoshou de zainan, zai wo shi naxie zainan fashengqian, meiyou yi jian bushi jilu zai tian jing [“shou baohu de xian pai”] zhong de, zhe dui an la que shi rongyi de,
yibian nimen bu wei nimen suo shiqu de er beishang, bu wei nimen suo shou ci de [enhui] er kuangxi. An la jue bu xihuan renhe zi da zikua zhe [zhu].
Fan ziji linse, qie jiao ren linse zhe,[xuzhi an la bu xuyao tamen de shishe]. Shei beili [yisilan jiao], name,[xuzhi] an la que shi wu suo qiu de, shou zansong de.

Wo que yi ping mingzheng paiqian wo de shizhemen, bing sui tamen yidao jiang shile jingdian he zhunze [gongzheng], yibian renmen zhuchi gongdao. Wo jiangxia tie [zhu], tie [zai zhanzheng zhong] liliang da, tongshi, dui renlei hai you xuduo yichu, yibian an la zhidao shei zai anzhong yuanzhu ta [de yisilan jiao] ji qi shizhemen. An la que shi zui qiang da de, quanneng de.
Wo que yi paiqian nu ha he yi bu la xin, bing ci gei ta lia de houyi sheng pin he jingdian, tamen zhong you zunxing zhengdao zhe, dan tamen da duoshu ren shi beini zhe.

Ranhou, zai tamen zhihou, wo you jixu paiqian wo de shizhemen. Wo paiqian ma'er ya zhizi er sa bing ci gei ta “yin ji lei”. Wo zai ta [er sa] de zhuisui zhe de xinzhong zhurule tongqing yu lianmin, dan tamen que zi chuangle xiudao zhidu, wangxiang yi ci xunqiu an la de xiyue. Wo wei dui tamen guiding ci zhidu, tamen ye wei zhenzheng zunxing ta. Tamen zhong fan xinyang de ren, wo du ciyu baochou, dan tamen da duoshu ren shi beini zhe.

Xinyang zhe [zhu][zheli te zhi xinyang mu sa (youtaijiao) he er sa (jidujiao) de ren] a! Ruguo nimen jingwei an la, xinyang ta de shizhe [mu sheng], ta [an la] jiang ci gei nimen shuang bei de enhui, bing ci gei nimen yi zhong guangming, nimen ke jie ci guangming xingzou [zunxing zhengdao]. Ta jiang kuanshu nimen. An la shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.

Yibian you jing ren [youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu] zhidao tamen jue buneng caozong an la de renhe enhui, bing zhidao yiqie enhui jun zai an la de zhangwo zhong. Ta ba enhui ciyu tasuo yiyu zhe [zhu]. An la shi you zhongda enhui de zhu.

An la que yi tingqu nage funu [he wu lei•bin te•sai a lei bai] xiang ni [mu sheng] shensu ziji de zhangfu [ai wu si•ben•sa mi te] bing xiang an la suku. An la tingjianle ni lia de bianlun. An la que shi quan wen de, quan shi de [zhu].

Nimen zhong fan ba ziji de qizi cheng wei ziji de muqin [xiang liqi tamen] de ren [ru zhangfu dui qizi shuo:“Ni dui wo jiu xiang wo muqin de bei yiyang (ji wo buneng yu ni fangshile)”], qishi, tamen bu [neng yinci jiu] shi tamen de muqin, tamen de muqin zhi neng shi shengyu tamen de ren. Tamen dique shuole e yan he huanghua. An la que shi zui kuanda de, zui kuanshu de.

Fanshi ba ziji de qizi cheng wei ziji de muqin [xiang liqi tamen], ranhou xiang shouhui ziji suo shuo zhi hua de ren,[qi chufa shi]: Zai ta lia fang shiqian, xu shifang yige nuli. Zhe shi yong lai quangao nimen de [gu nimen buyao gan zhe zhong chunshi]. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi che zhi de.

Wuneng zheyang zuo [shifang nuli] zhe, zai ta lia fang shiqian, xu lianxu zhaijie liang ge yue. Buneng zhaijie zhe, xu gongji liushi ge pinmin yi ri de yinshi. Zhe shi weile rang nimen wanmei di xinyang an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng]. Zhe shi an la de fadu. Bu xinyang zhe bi shou tongku de xingfa.

Fan weikang an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] de ren, tamen bi jiang zaoshou chiru, youru tamen de qian ren [guoqu de minzu] suo zaoshou de chiru yiyang. Wo que yi jiang shi mingxian de jixiang. Bu xinyang zhe bi shou lingru de xingfa.
Zai na ri, an la jiang ba tamen quanbu fuhuo, jiang ba tamen sheng qian suo zuo de gaosu tamen. An la yi ji xia naxie xingwei, er tamen que wangle. An la shi jianzheng wanshi wanwu de.

Nandao ni bu zhidao ma? An la quanzhi tiandi jian de yiqie. Zhiyao yousan geren de mitan, ta [an la] jiushi tamen zhong de di si ge; zhiyao you wu geren de mitan, ta jiushi tamen zhong de di liu ge; bulun [renshu] bi zhe shao haishi bi zhe duo [de mitan], bulun tamen zai nali [mitan], ta [an la] dou yu tamen tong zai. Ranhou, fuhuo ri, ta jiang ba tamen shengqian suo zuo de gaosu tamen. An la que shi quanzhi wanshi wanwu de.

Nandao ni meiyou kanjian naxie bei jinzhi mitan er you weijin mitan de ren ma? Tamen wei fanzui, qinhai he weikang shizhe [mu sheng] er mitan. Dang tamen lai dao ni nali shi, tamen yi an la meiyou dui ni yongguo de zhuci zhuhe ni [zhu], tamen zi yan zi yu shuo:“Weisheme an la bu yin women suo shuo de er chengfa women ne?” Huo yu zugou tamen shoule! Tamen jiang jinru qizhong [shou huoxing]. Guisu zhen elie!

Xinshimen a! Dang nimen mitan shi [zhu], nimen buyao wei fanzui, qinhai he weikang shizhe [mu sheng] er mitan, nimen dang wei zhengyi he qianjing er mitan. Nimen dang jingwei an la, nimen dou jiang bei jihe dao ta nali qu.
Xie'e de mitan zhi chuzi emo, qi mudi shi shi xinshimen youchou. Wei jing an la xuke, emo jue buneng shanghai tamen sihao. Jiao xinshimen zhi xinlai an la ba [zhu]!

Xinshimen a! Dang youren zai huichang [gonggong changsuo] zhong dui nimen shuo “qing nimen rang yixia” shi, nimen dang rang kai, an la hui shi nimen kuankuo de. Dang youren [wei libai he xingshan deng] dui nimen shuo “qing nimen qilai” shi, nimen dang qilai. An la jiang tigao nimen zhong de xinshi he shou ci zhishi zhe xuduo pinji. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi che zhi de.

Xinshimen a! Dang nimen yao sixia qingjiao shizhe [mu sheng] shi, nimen zai qingjiao qian ying xian zuo xie shishe, zhe dui nimen shi zui hao de, zui chunjie de. Jiaru nimen mei wu shishe,[xuzhi] an la que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.

Nandao nimen pa zai sixia qingjiao [mu sheng] qian xian zuo xie shishe ma? Jiaru nimen meiyou shishe, er an la yi kuanshu nimen, name,[zhishao] nimen dang jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, fucong an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng]. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi che zhi de.

Nandao ni [mu sheng] meiyou kanjian naxie yu an la suo qian nu de minzhong [youtai jiaotu] jiejiao pengyou de ren [wei xinzhe] ma [zhu]? Tamen ji bu shuyu nimen [musilin], ye bu shuyu naxie minzhong [youtai jiaotu]. Tamen guyi fa jia shi.
An la yi wei tamen zhunbeile yanli de xingfa. Tamen suo zuo de zhen elie!
Tamen yi ziji de shiyan [wei e xing] zuo yanhu, bing fang'ai renmen zunxing an la zhi dao, tamen bi shou lingru de xingfa.
Tamen de caichan he ernu jue bu hui you zhu yu tamen diyu an la de renhe xingfa. Zhexie ren shi huo yu de fanren, tamen jiang yong ju qizhong.

Dang an la ba tamen quanbu fuhuo di na ri, tamen jiang xiang ta fashi, youru tamen [zai chenshi] xiang nimen [musilin] fashi yiyang, tamen yiwei ziji shi you daoli de. Xuzhi, tamen que shi shuohuang zhe.
Emo yi zhifu tamen, bing shi tamen wangle zan nian an la [zhu]. Zhexie ren shi emo de tong dang. Xuzhi, emo de tong dang que shi sunshi zhe.
Fan weikang an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] de ren, zhexie ren shi zui beijian de.
An la zhuding:“Wo he wo de shizhemen bi jiang shengli.” An la que shi zui qiang da de, quanneng de.

Fan xinyang an la he mori de minzhong, ni [mu sheng] jiang jian bu dao tamen hui xihuan weikang an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] de ren, jishi naxie ren shi tamen de fuqin, huo ernu, huo xiongdi [zhu][jiemei], huo qinqi. Zhexie ren, ta [an la] yi ba “yi ma ni [xinyang]” yin zai tamen de xin shang, bing yi ta nali de yi zhong jingshen zengqiang tamen [de liliang]. Ta jiang shi tamen jinru zhu heliuguo de leyuan, yong ju qizhong. An la xiyue tamen, tamen jing'ai an la. Zhexie ren shi an la de dangpai. Xuzhi, an la de dangpai que shi chenggong de.
Tiandi jian de yiqie dou zansong an la. Ta shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.

Chuci fangzhu shi, shi ta [an la] ba you jing ren zhong de bu xinyang zhe [ru youtaijiao de bai ni•nai di er buluo] zhu chule tamen de jiayuan, nimen meiyou xiangdao tamen hui li qu. Tamen renwei tamen de baolei neng baohu tamen mian zao an la de xingfa, er an la de xingfa que cong tamen liao xiangbudao di difang jianglin tamen. Ta [an la] ba kongju touru tamen de xinzhong, yibian tamen yong ziji de shou he xinshimen de shou chaihui tamen de fangwu. You yanli de renmen a! Nimen jieshou jiaoxun ba!
Yaoshi an la meiyou wei tamen guiding fangzhu, ta bi zai jinshi chengfa tamen; zai houshi, tamen hai yao shou huo yu de xingfa.
Zhe shi yinwei tamen weikang an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng]. Shei weikang an la,[an la bi chengfa shei]. An la que shi chengfa yanli de.
Wulun nimen [musilin] kanfa [diren de] ye zao shu, haishi rang qi yuan di bu dong [ji bu kanfa], dou shi an la yunxu de, yibian ta xiuru beini zhe.

Fanshi an la shou zi tamen [diren] er ciyu ta de shizhe [mu sheng] de caichan [zhanlipin], nimen dou meiyou hanmagonglao, dan an la shi ta de shizhemen you nengli zhifu tasuo yiyu zhe. An la dui wanshi shi wanneng de.

Fanshi an la shou zi zhucheng zhi ren [diren] er ciyu ta de shizhe [mu sheng] de caichan [zhu 1][zhanlipin], quan gui an la, shizhe [mu sheng],[mu sheng de] qinqi, gu'er, pinmin he luxing zhe, yimian naxie caichan zhi liutong yu nimen zhong de fu ren zhi jian. Fanshi shizhe [mu sheng] jiao gei nimen de, nimen dang jieshou; fanshi shizhe jinzhi nimen de, nimen dang jiechu [zhu 2]. Nimen dang jingwei an la, an la que shi chengfa yanli de.

[Zhexie zhanlipin de yibufen ye] ying guiyu qian shi [likai mai jia sui mu sheng yiqi qianyi dao mai di na de musilin] zhong de qiongren, tamen bei po fangqi ziji de jiayuan he caichan, yi xunqiu an la de enhui he xiyue; tamen yuanzhu an la [zhi dao] ji qi shizhe [mu sheng]. Zhexie ren que shi chengshi zhe.

[Zhexie zhanlipin de yibufen ye] ying guiyu zai tamen [lai mai di na] zhiqian jiu anju mai di na bing jieshou “yi ma ni [xinyang]” zhe, tamen xihuan qianju dao tamen nali de jiao bao, tamen de xiongzhong bu jidu qian shimen [cong youtaijiao de bai ni•nai di er buluo] suo huode de [zhanlipin]. Jishi tamen jixu, tamen ye yuan xian ren hou ji. Fan jiechu zishen de tan lin zhe, zhexie ren que shi chenggong zhe.

Naxie zai tamen zhihou lai dao [mai di na] de ren shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni kuanshu women he zai women zhiqian yi xinyang de xiongdi [jiemei]men, qiu ni buyao rang women de xin yuanhen xinshimen. Women de zhu a! Ni que shi ren'ai de, te ci de.”

Nandao ni [mu sheng] meiyou kanjian naxie wei xin de ren ma? Tamen dui ziji de xiongdi [jiemei]——you jing ren zhong de bu xinyang zhe shuo:“[Yi an la fashi!] Jiaru nimen bei quzhu [chu mai di na], women yiding tong nimen yiqi chujing, women jue bu fucong renhe ren duifu nimen; jiaru nimen [zhanzheng zhong] bei gongji, women yiding yuanzhu nimen.” Dan an la jianzheng tamen que shi shuohuang zhe [zhu].

Jiaru tamen [youtai jiaotu] bei quzhu [chu mai di na], tamen [wei xinzhe] jue bu huitong tamen yiqi chujing; jiaru tamen [zhanzheng zhong] bei gongji, tamen [wei xinzhe] jue bu hui yuanzhu tamen. Jishi tamen [wei xinzhe] yuanzhu tamen, tamen [wei xinzhe] ye biding zhuanshen er tao, suoyi tamen jue bu hui huosheng.
Zai tamen [youtaijiao de bai ni•nai di er buluo] de xinzhong, nimen [xinshi] bi an la geng kepa, zhe shi yinwei tamen shi buming li de minzhong.

Tamen bu hui quanti tong nimen zuozhan [zhu], chufei shi zai you baolei de chengzhong, huo chengqiang hou. Tamen de nei zheng hen jilie. Ni renwei tamen shi tuanjie de, qishi, tamen de xin shi huansan de, zhe shi yinwei tamen shi buming li de minzhong.
[Tamen de qingkuang] youru tamen gang shiqu de qian ren [youtaijiao de bai ni•gai yi nu gao a buluo], naxie qian ren changshile ziji xingwei de eguo,[houshi] tamen hai jiang shou tongku de xingfa.

[Wei xinzhe de qingkuang] youru emo [zhu]. Dangshi, emo dui ren shuo:“Ni buyao xinyang [an la].” Dan dang ta [ren] bu xinyang [an la] shi, emo you shuo:“Wo yu ni shi hao wu guanxi de, wo dique weiju an la——zhong shijie de zhu.”
Ta lia de jieju shi tong ru huo yu, yong ju qizhong. Zhe shi bu yi zhe de baochou.

Xinshimen a! Nimen dang jingwei an la. Mei ren dou ying xiang yi xiang ziji yi wei mingtian [houshi] zuole xie shenme. Nimen dang jingwei an la. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la que shi che zhi de [zhu].
Nimen buyao xiang naxie wangji [ji weikang] an la, yin'er an la shi tamen wangji tamen ziji de ren yiyang. Zhexie ren que shi beini zhe.
Huo yu de fanren yu leyuan de jumin shi bu xiangdeng de. Leyuan de jumin que shi chenggong zhe.

Jiaru wo ba zhe bu “gulanjing” jiang zai yizuo shanshang, ni [mu sheng] yiding hui kanjian na zuo shan yin weiju an la er qiangong, er beng sui [zhu]. Zhexie shi wo wei renlei suo shezhi de biyu, yibian tamen shensi.
Ta shi an la, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Ta quanzhi yiqie kan bujian zhi wu he kan de jian zhi wu. Ta shi pu ci de, te ci de.

Ta shi an la, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Ta shi zhuquan de zhu, shengjie de zhu, ci anning de zhu, baoyou de zhu, jianhu wanwu de zhu, quanneng de zhu, qiangda de zhu, zhizun de zhu. Zanmei an la chaojue! Zhigaowushang de ta [an la] chaojue yu tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang.
Ta shi an la, chuangzao zhe, zhizao zhe, fu xing zhe, yiqie zuimei de mingcheng dou shi ta de. Tiandi jian de yiqie dou zansong ta. Ta shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.

Xinshimen a! Nimen buyao yi wo de diren he nimen de diren [ru bu xinyang zhe, bai ouxiang zhe] wei pengyou. Nimen xiang tamen biaoshi you'ai, er tamen que yi bu xinyang jianglin nimen de zhenli [ru mu sheng he “gulanjing”]. Zhi yin nimen xinyang an la——nimen de zhu, tamen jiu ba shizhe [mu sheng] he nimen quzhu chujing. Jiaru nimen li jia shi wei wo de dao er fendou, xunqiu wo de xiyue,[nimen jiu buyao yi zhe zhong renwei pengyou]. Nimen anzhong xiang tamen biaoshi you'ai. Fanshi nimen suo yincang de he gongkai de, wo quanzhidao. Nimen zhong shei zheyang zuo, shei que yi mishi zhengdao.
Jiaru tamen shengguo nimen, tamen bian hui chengwei nimen de diren, cong'er shen chu tamen de shou gongji nimen, yong tamen de she ruma nimen, tamen xiwang nimen bu xinyang.
Fuhuo ri, nimen de qinqi he ernu jue bu hui you zhu yu nimen [diyu an la de renhe xingfa]. Ta jiang wei nimen caijue. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi quan shi de.

Yi bu la xin he ta de zhuisui zhe que shi nimen de hao bangyang. Dangshi, tamen dui ziji de zuren shuo:“Women tong nimen he nimen she an la er chongbai de [ouxiang] que shi hao wu guanxi de, women bu xiangxin nimen [he nimen suo chongbai de ouxiang]. Chufei nimen xinyang an la du yi, fouze, women he nimen zhi jian de dishi yu chouhen jiang yongyuan cunzai.” Wei yi bu la xin dui ta de fuqin suo shuo dehua liwai [ji buke zuowei bangyang].[Ta ceng shuo]:“Wo yiding wei ni [xiang an la] qiurao, dan wo wu zhu yu ni diyu an la de renhe xingfa.”[Jian 9:114,19:41-49,26:70-86].[Tamen shuo]:“Women de zhu a! Women zhi xinlai ni, women zhi xiang ni huizui [zhu]. Wei ni [an la] shi zuihou de guisu.
Women de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao rang women chengwei bu xinyang zhe [dui women] de kaoyan [pohai]. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni kuanshu women. Ni que shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.”
Yi bu la xin he ta de zhuisui zhe, dui nimen——suoyou kewang yu an la xiang hui he mori zhe que shi hao bangyang. Shei beili [na wusun yu an la],[xuzhi] an la que shi wu suo qiu de, shou zansong de.
Yexu an la hui shi nimen he nimen shi wei choudi zhe zhi jian chansheng youqing. An la shi wanneng de; an la shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.

Fan weiceng yin nimen de zongjiao er dui nimen zuozhan, ye weiceng ba nimen quzhu chu nimen de jiayuan zhe, an la bu jin zhi nimen yu tamen youhao he gongping xiangchu. An la dique xihuan gongping zhe [zhu].

Zhiyu yin nimen de zongjiao er dui nimen zuozhan, ba nimen quzhu chu nimen de jiayuan zhe, yiji xiezhu quzhu nimen de ren, an la jinzhi nimen yu tamen youhao. Shei yu tamen youhao, zhexie ren que shi bu yi zhe.

Xinshimen a! Dang nu xinshi qianyi dao nimen nali shi, nimen dang kaoyan tamen. An la zui zhidao tamen de xinyang. Jiaru nimen zhidao tamen que shi xinshi, name, nimen jiu buyao ba tamen qian hui gei bu xinyang zhe. Tamen dui tamen [bu xinyang zhe] shi bu hefa de [tamen buke zuo tamen de qizi], tamen dui tamen yeshi bu hefa de [tamen buke zuo tamen de zhangfu]. Dan nimen ying ba tamen [bu xinyang zhe] suo huafei de pinjin [jiehun shi xinlang gei xinniang de qiancai] ru shu tuihuan tamen. Jiaru nimen yi ba tamen ying de de pinjin fu gei tamen, name, nimen yu tamen jiehun, dui nimen shi wu zui de. Nimen buyao jianchi yu bu xinyang de funu de hunyue, nimen ke [xiang bu xinyang de funu] suo hui nimen suo huafei de pinjin, jiao tamen [bu xinyang zhe] ye [xiang nu xinshi] suo hui tamen suo huafei de pinjin. Zhe shi an la de faling. Ta wei nimen panjue. An la shi quan zhi de, zui ruizhi de.

Jiaru nimen de qizi zhong you paoqi nimen er tao xiang bu xinyang zhe de, nimen you yin baofu [bu xinyang zhe] er huo yi, name, nimen ying ba qizi taoli zhe suo huafei de pinjin ru shu tuihuan tamen. Nimen dang jingwei nimen suo xinyang de an la.

Xianzhi [mu sheng] a! Dang nu xinshi lai xiang ni fashi: Tamen jue bu gei an la shezhi renhe pei wu, bu toudao, bu jianyin, bu shahai ziji de ernu, bu feibang, bu niezao huangyan [ru bu ba feifa suo huai zhizi shuo cheng shi zhangfu zhizi], buzai yisilan jiaoyi jiaogui shang weibei ni, name, ni dang jieshou tamen de shiyan, dang qiu an la kuanshu tamen. An la que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
Xinshimen a! Nimen buyao yu an la suo qian nu de minzhong [ru youtai jiaotu] wei you. Tamen que yi dui houshi juewang, youru bu xinyang zhe dui fenmu zhong de ren [jiang bei fuhuo] juewang yiyang.
Tiandi jian de yiqie dou zansong an la. Ta shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.
Xinshimen a! Nimen weisheme zhi shuo bu zuo ne [zhu]?
Zai an la kan lai, nimen zhi shuo bu zuo shi feichang kehen de.
An la dique xihuan zhe zhong ren: Tamen wei ta [an la] de dao lie zhen zuozhan [zhu], youru jiangu de chengqiang.

Dangshi, mu sa dui ta de zuren shuo:“Wo de zuren a! Nimen ji zhidao wo shi an la pai lai jiaohua nimen de shizhe, nimen weisheme hai yao zenan wo ne?” Dang tamen beili [an la zhidao] shi, an la jiu shi tamen de xin beili zhengdao. An la jue bu yindao beini de minzhong.

Dangshi, ma'er ya zhizi er sa [zhu 1] shuo:“Yiselie de houyi a! Wo que shi an la pai lai jiaohua nimen de shizhe, yi zhengshi zai wo zhiqian jiang shi de “tao la te”, bing yi zai wo zhihou jiang dansheng de yi wei shizhe [mu sheng] xiang nimen baoxi, ta de mingzi jiao ai ha mai de [zhu 2][mu sheng de di er ge mingzi].” Dang ta daizhe mingzheng lai dao tamen nali shi, tamen shuo:“Zhe shi mingxian de moshu.”
Shei bi youren zhaohuan ta xinfeng yisilan jiao, er ta que jie an la de mingyi niezao huangyan zhe geng bu yi ne? An la jue bu yindao bu yi de minzhong.
Tamen xiang yong ziji de kou chui mie an la de guangming [yisilan jiao, mu sheng he “gulanjing”], dan an la yao wanmei ziji de guangming, jishi bu xinyang zhe bu xihuan.
Shi ta yi zhengdao he zhenli zhi jiao [yisilan jiao] paiqian ta de shizhe [mu sheng], yibian ta [an la] shi zhenli zhi jiao shengguo yiqie zongjiao, jishi bai ouxiang zhe bu xihuan.
Xinshimen a! Yao wo gei nimen zhishi yi zhong neng zhengjiu nimen tuoli tongku xingfa de jiaoyi ma?
[Na jiushi]: Nimen ying xinyang an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], nimen yingyong ziji de caichan he shengming wei an la zhi dao fendou. Zhe dui nimen shi zui hao de, jiaru nimen zhi dao.
[Jiaru nimen zheyang zuo], ta [an la] jiang kuanshu nimen de zuiguo, bing shi nimen jinru zhu heliuguo de leyuan, changzhu yu yongjiu de leyuan de haohua zhuzhai li. Zhe shi weida de chenggong.
[Ta hai jiang ci gei nimen] ling yi zhong nimen suo xihuan de enhui:[Weile duifu nimen de diren er] cong an la jiang shi de yuanzhu he linjin de shengli. Ni [mu sheng] xiang xinshimen baoxi ba!

Xinshimen a! Nimen dangzuo an la [zhi dao] de zhushou, youru ma'er ya zhizi er sa ceng dui ta de mentumen suo shuo de:“Shei wei an la [zhi dao] er zuo wo de zhushou?” Mentumen shuo:“Women shi an la [zhi dao] de zhushou [ru women yuan wei an la zhi dao fendou].” Yiselie de houyi zhong, you yipai ren xinyang, er ling yipai ren ze bu xinyang. Wo yuanzhu xinshimen diyu tamen de diren, yinci, tamen [xinshi] bian chengle shengli zhe.
Tiandi jian de yiqie dou zansong an la——zhuquan de zhu, shengjie de zhu, quanneng de zhu, zui ruizhi de zhu.

Shi ta cong wenmang zhong paiqianle tamen tongzu de yi wei shizhe [mu sheng], rang ta [mu sheng] xiang tamen xuandu ta [an la] de qishi, jinghua tamen bing jiaoshou tamen jingdian [“gulanjing”] he zhihui [zhu][“sheng xun”], jinguan tamen yiqian shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong;
bing jiaohua tamen zhong shangwei jiaru tamen [musilin] de qita ren [ji jiaohua shangwei xinfeng yisilan jiao zhe]. Ta shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.
Zhe shi an la de enhui, ta ba enhui ciyu tasuo yiyu zhe. An la shi you zhongda enhui de zhu.
Naxie fengming zunxing “tao la te” er bu zunxing de ren, tamen de qingkuang youru tuo jing de luzi. Fouren an la de qishi de minzhong de qingkuang zhen elie! An la jue bu yindao bu yi de minzhong.
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Youtai jiaotu a! Jiaru nimen wangcheng renlei zhong zhiyou nimen shi an la de pengyou, name, nimen qiqiu siwang ba! Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe.”
Tamen jue bu hui yin ziji qinshou suo fan de zui'e er qiqiu siwang. An la shi quanzhi bu yi zhe de.

Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen suo taobi de siwang, bi jiang yu nimen jianmian [zhu], ranhou, nimen bi jiang bei song dao quanzhi yiqie kan bujian zhi wu he kan de jian zhi wu de zhu [an la] nali qu, ta jiang ba nimen cengjing suo zuo de gaosu nimen.”

Xinshimen a! Dang ju li ri [zhu ma ri] zhaohuan libai shi [zhu], nimen dang gankuai qu zan nian an la [ru ting nian “hu tu bai”(xuanjiang jiaoyi jiaogui), libai deng], dang fangxia maimai [ji suoyou shi], zhe dui nimen shi zui hao de, jiaru nimen zhidao.
Libai wanbi shi, nimen dang sanbu zai da dishang xunqiu an la de enhui. Nimen dang chang zan nian an la, yibian nimen chenggong.

Dang tamen kanjian maimai huo yule shi, tamen bian fensan ben xiang ta, rang ni [mu sheng] duzi zhanzhe [zhu][yanjiang “hu tu bai”]. Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Fan zai an la nali de, dou bi yule he maimai hao. An la shi zui hao de gongji zhe.”
Dang wei xinzhe lai dao ni [mu sheng] nali shi tamen shuo:“Women zuozheng: Ni que shi an la de shizhe.” An la zhidao, ni que shi ta de shizhe. An la zuozheng: Wei xinzhe que shi shuohuang zhe.
Tamen [yin xuwei er] ba ziji de shiyan dang yanhu, fang'ai renmen zunxing an la zhidao. Tamen [wei xinzhe] suo zuo de zhen elie!
Zhe shi yinwei, tamen xinyangle, ranhou you bu xinyang, yin'er tamen de xin bei fengbile, suoyi, tamen bu lijie.

Dang ni [mu sheng] kanjian tamen shi, tamen de timao shi ni xianmu. Dang tamen shuohua shi, ni jiu jing ting tamen de yanci. Tamen haoxiang mu'ou yiyang, tamen yiwei mei ge jiaohan sheng dou shi zhendui tamen de. Tamen [wei xinzhe] shi [ni de] diren, suoyi, ni dang jinfang tamen. Qiu an la huimie tamen! Tamen hedeng beili zhenli!
Mei dang youren dui tamen shuo “nimen lai ba! An la de shizhe jiang wei nimen [xiang an la] qiurao” shi, tamen jiu diaotou bugu, ni kanjian tamen wangzizunda di li qu.

Wulun ni [mu sheng] wei tamen [xiang an la] qiurao, haishi bu wei tamen [xiang an la] qiurao, dui tamen dou shi yiyang de, an la jue bu hui raoshu tamen. An la jue bu yindao beini de minzhong [jian 4:138-145].
Tamen shuo:“Nimen buyao shishe gei an la de shizhe [mu sheng] zhouwei de ren, yibian tamen likai ta [mu sheng].” Tiandi jian de baozang dou shi an la de, dan wei xinzhe bing bu lijie.

Tamen [wei xinzhe] shuo:“Jiaru women fanhui mai di na, zui gaogui zhe [abu du la•ben•wu bai ye•ben•sai lu lei, xi mai di na cheng de wei xin toumu] bi ba zui beijian zhe [zhi mu sheng] quzhu chu gai cheng.”[Xuzhi] yiqie rongyao dou shi an la, ta de shizhe [mu sheng] he xinshimen de, dan wei xinzhe bing bu zhidao.
Xinshimen a! Buyao rang nimen de caichan he ernu shi nimen shuhu zan nian an la. Shei zheyang zuo, zhexie ren que shi sunshi zhe.

Zai siwang jianglin nimen zhiqian, nimen dang shishe wo suo ciyu nimen de caifu, yimian ta [ren] dao shi [shenpan ri] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Jiaru ni yanhuan wo yidian er shijian [fanhui chenshi], name, wo yiding shishe wo de caifu [zhu][ru jiao tian ke], yiding chengwei xingshan zhe zhi yi [ru wancheng chaojin gongke deng].”
Dang yige ren de siqi lailin shi, an la jue bu hui rang ta yanhuan. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi che zhi de.
Tiandi jian de yiqie dou zansong an la. Zhuquan quan gui ta, zansong quan gui ta. Ta dui wanshi shi wanneng de.
Shi ta chuangzao nimen, ranhou nimen zhong you bu xinyang de, yeyou xinyang de. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi quan shi de.
Ta yi zhenli chuangzao tiandi. Ta shi nimen chengxing, shi nimen de xingxiang wanmei [zhu]. Wei ta [an la] shi zuihou de guisu.
Ta zhidao tiandi jian de yiqie. Fanshi nimen suoyincang de he gongkai de, ta quanzhi dao. An la shi quan zhi [renlei] xiongzhong yiqie de.
Nandao yiqian bu xinyang zhe de xiaoxi hai meiyou daoda nimen ma? Tamen changshile ziji bu xinyang an la de eguo,[houshi] tamen hai yao shou tongku de xingfa.

Zhe shi yinwei, tamen de shizhemen yi daizhe mingzheng daoda tamen, dan tamen queshuo:“Nandao fanren ye neng yindao women ma?” Suo yi, tamen bu xinyang bing beili zhenli. Qishi, an la bing bu xuyao tamen [de xinyang]. An la shi wu suo qiu de, shou zansong de.

Bu xinyang zhe wangcheng tamen jue bu hui bei fuhuo. Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Juedui hui! Yi wo de zhu fashi, nimen bi jiang bei fuhuo. Ranhou, nimen bi jiang bei gaozhi nimen cengjing suo zuo de. Zhe dui an la shi rongyi de.”
Yinci, nimen dang xinyang an la ji qi shizhe [zhu][mu sheng], yiji wo suo jiang shi de guangming [“gulanjing”]. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi che zhi de.

Zai na ri——fuhuo ri, ta jiang jihe nimen, zhe jiushi chenggong [xinshi jin leyuan] yu shibai [bu xinyang zhe jin huo yu] zhi ri.[Zai chenshi shi] shei xinyang an la bing xingshan,[zai na ri] ta [an la] jiang shemian shei de zuiguo, bing shi ta jinru zhu heliuguo de leyuan, yong ju qizhong. Zhe shi weida de chenggong.
Naxie bu xinyang bing fouren wo de qishi de ren, zhexie ren shi huo yu de fanren,[tamen jiang] yong ju qizhong. Guisu zhen elie!
Wulun fasheng shenme zainan, dou shi yi an la de zhuding [zhu][qian ding]. Shei xinyang an la, ta [an la] jiu yindao shei de xin [zhi yisilan jiao]. An la shi quanzhi wanshi wanwu de.
Nimen dang fucong an la, dang fucong shizhe [zhu][mu sheng]. Jiaru nimen beili, name, wo de shizhe zhi fuze mingbai di chuanda [wo de qishi].
An la, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Jiao xinshimen zhi xinlai an la ba!

Xinshimen a! Zai nimen de qizi he ernu zhong, youxie que shi nimen de diren [tamen zu'ai nimen xinyang an la], yinci, nimen dang jinfang tamen. Jiaru nimen yuanliang tamen, kuanrong [tamen], raoshu [tamen de guocuo], name, an la que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
Nimen de caichan he ernu zhishi yi zhong kaoyan, zai an la nali que you zhongda de baochou [leyuan].
Nimen dang jinli jingwei an la, dang qingting, dang fucong, dang shishe, zhe dui nimen ziji shi zui hao de. Fan jiechu zishen de tan lin zhe, zhexie ren que shi chenggong zhe.
Jiaru nimen wei an la [zhidao] juanxian yi bi shan kuan, ta jiang jiabei ci hai nimen bing kuanshu nimen. An la shi zuishan bao de, zui kuanrong de.
[An la] shi quanzhi yiqie kan bujian zhi wu he kan de jian zhi wu de zhu, shi quanneng de, shi zui ruizhi de.

Xianzhi [mu sheng] a! Nimen xiu qi shi, nimen dang zai tamen de dai hunqi nei xiu tamen. Nimen dang jisuan [tamen de] dai hunqixian. Nimen dang jingwei an la——nimen de zhu. Nimen buyao ba tamen gan chu tamen de [zhangfu de] jia [zhu], tamen ye bude shanzi likai, chufei tamen fan you mingxian de jianyin. Zhe shi an la de fadu. Shei chaoyue an la de fadu, shei que yi shi ziji shou sun. Ni [xiu qi zhe] bu zhi dao, yexu an la hui zai cihou shi yi jian xin shi chuxian [ru ta jia gei ling yi wei zhangfu lihun hou, you yu ni fuhun].

Dang tamen wanchengle ziji de dai hunqixianshi, nimen dang haoyi wanliu tamen, huo haoyi yu tamen libie. Nimen dang qing nimen [musilin] zhong de liang ge gongzheng ren zuozheng, nimen ye ying wei an la zuozheng, zhe shi yong lai quangao xinyang an la he mori zhe de. Shei jingwei an la, ta [an la] bi gei shei yitiao [baituo kunjing de] chulu.

Ta [an la] bi cong ta liao xiangbudao di difang gongji ta. Shei xinlai an la, ta bi shi shei manzu. An la dique neng shixian ziji de zhiyi. An la que yi wei wanshi wanwu zhidingle dingshu [qian ding].

Nimen de funu zhong dui yuejing yi juewang zhe [yiguo gengnianqi zhe], jiaru nimen huaiyi [tamen], name, tamen de dai hun qi shi san ge yue, shangwei lai yuejing zhe ②[wei chengnian zhe] ye yiyang. Huaiyun zhe de qi xian shi tamen de fenmian qi man. Shei jingwei an la, ta [an la] bi shi shei de shiwu rongyi.
Zhe shi an la jiang gei nimen de faling. Shei jingwei an la, ta [an la] bi shemian shei de zuiguo, bing ci gei ta geng duo de baochou.

Nimen dang yi zishen de nengli shi tamen [yi lihun de qizi] zan zhu zai nimen suo zhu di difang, nimen buyao wei poshi tamen li qu er shanghai tamen. Jiaru tamen huaiyun, name, nimen dang gongji tamen shenghuo suo xu, zhidao tamen fenmian. Jiaru tamen wei nimen buru [nimen de haizi], name, nimen dang ba tamen ying de de baochou fu gei tamen, nimen dang youhao xieshang. Jiaru nimen nanyu dacheng xieyi, name, ke rang bie de funu wei ta [haizi de fuqin] buru [haizi].

Rang fuyu zhe yi ziji de caifu shiyong, rang jiongpo zhe yi an la suo ciyu ta de caifu shiyong. An la zhi rang yige ren an ta [an la] suo ciyu ta de nengli fudan. Kun nan zhihou, an la jiang ciyu rongyi.

You xuduo chengshi [de jumin] ceng weikang tamen de zhu [an la] ji qi shizhemen de mingling, wo [an la] yanli de qingsuanle tamen [ru shi tamen zai jinshi zao zai],[zai houshi] wo hai yao yi kepa de xingfa [huo yu] chengzhi tamen.
Tamen changshile ziji bu xinyang an la de eguo, tamen bu xinyang an la de jieju jiushi zao huimie [zai jinshi zao huimie, zai houshi hai yao shou yongjiu de xingfa].
An la wei tamen zhunbeile yanxing. You lizhi de renmen——xinshimen a! Nimen dang jingwei an la. An la que yi jiang gei nimen yi xiang jiaohui [“gulanjing”],

[Bing gei nimen paiqianle] yi wei shizhe [mu sheng], ta [mu sheng] xiang nimen xuandu an la de qishi,[na qishi] chanming wanshi wanwu, yibian ta shi xinyang bing xingshan zhe cong hei'an [ru bu xinyang an la he duo shen chongbai] zouxiang guangming [yisilan jiao]. Shei xinyang an la bing xingshan, ta [an la] bi shi shei jinru zhu heliuguo de leyuan, yong ju qizhong. An la que yi ci gei ta youmei de jiyang.

Shi an la chuangzaole qi ge tian he yuqi tong shu de dadi [zhu].[An la de] mingling tongguo tiandi er jiang shi, yibian nimen zhidao, an la dui wanshi que shi wanneng de, an la que shi zhouzhi wanshi wanwu de.
Xianzhi [mu sheng] a! An la zhunxu ni xiangshou de, ni weisheme yao jinzhi [ziji xiangshou] er tao ni de qizimen de xihuan ne? An la shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
An la que yi wei nimen [renlei] guiding jiechu shiyan de fangfa. An la shi nimen de zhuzai [baohu zhe]. Ta shi quanzhi de, zui ruizhi de.

Dang xianzhi sixia ba yi jian shi toulu gei ta de yi wei qizi [ha fu sa] shi, ta bian ba ta xielou gei bieren [zhu][zhi mu sheng de ling yi wei qizi a yi sha]. Dang an la shi ta [mu sheng] zhidao xiemi shijian shi,[zhihou] ta [mu sheng] jiu rang ta zhidao yibufen, er baomi yibufen. Dang ta [mu sheng] ba xiemi shijian gaosu ta [ha fu sa] shi, ta shuo:“Zhe shi shei gaosu ni de?” Ta [mu sheng] shuo:“Shi quanzhi de, che zhi de zhu [an la] gaosu wo de.”

Jiaru ni lia [ha fu sa he a yi sha] xiang an la huizui,[na dui ni lia shi zui hao de], yinwei ni lia de xin que yi pianxiangle. Jiaru ni lia xieshou duifu ta [mu sheng],[xuzhi] an la que shi ta de baohu zhe, ji bu li lei [tianshi] he xingshan de xinshimen, ciwai hai you tianshimen dou shi ta de zhichi zhe.

Jiaru ta [mu sheng] xiule nimen, ta de zhu yexu hui ci gei ta bi nimen geng hao de qizi [daiti nimen],[naxie qizi jiang] shi musilin, xinshi, fucong [an la] zhe,[xiang an la] huizui zhe,[qiancheng] chongbai an la zhe, zhaijie zhe [huo wei an la zhi dao qianxi zhe], guafu he chunu.

Xinshimen a! Nimen dang baohu nimen ziji he nimen de jiaren mian shou yi ren he shi zuo ranliao de huoxing [zhu], zhixing huoxing de tianshimen shi keke de, yanli de, tamen jue bu weikang an la suo mingling tamen de, tamen zhixing ziji suo feng dao de mingling.
Bu xinyang zhe a! Jintian, nimen buyao tuoci, nimen zhi shou nimen suo zuo [zui'e] de huan bao.

Xinshimen a! Nimen dang xiang an la qiancheng huizui [zhu], nimen de zhu yexu hui shemian nimen de zui'e, bing shi nimen jinru zhu heliuguo de leyuan. Zai na ri, an la jiang bu lingru xianzhi [mu sheng] he tong ta yiqi xinyang de renmen, tamen de guangming jiang zai tamen de qianmian benchi, yong youshou [na gongguo bu] zhe jiang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni wei women er wanmei women de guangming [qiu ni buyao ximie ta, qiu ni rang women anquan tongguo “sui lao te” qiao (huo yu shang yitiao xi si ban feichang hua de qiao)], qiu ni kuanshu women, ni dui wanshi que shi wanneng de.”
Xianzhi a! Ni dang fenli fanji bu xinyang zhe he wei xinzhe [zhu], dang yanli duidai tamen. Tamen de guisu shi huo yu. Guisu zhen elie!

An la yi nu ha de qizi he lu te de qizi wei bu xinyang zhe she ge biyu, ta lia sui shi wo de liang ge shan pu de qizi, dan ta lia bu zhongyu ta lia de zhangfu [ru jujue xiangxin ta lia de zhangfu suo xuanchuan de yisilan jiao jiaoyi jiaogui], suoyi, ta lia de zhangfu wu zhu yu ta lia diyu an la de renhe xingfa. You hua sheng [dui ta lia] shuo:“Ni lia yu jinru huo yu zhe yiqi jinru huo yu ba!”

An la yi falao de qizi wei xinshimen she ge biyu. Dangshi, ta [falao de qizi] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zai leyuan li wei wo jianzao yi suo jiejin ni de fangzi, qiu ni zhengjiu wo tuoli falao ji qi e xing, qiu ni zhengjiu wo tuo li bu yi de minzhong.”

[An la hai yi] yi mulan zhi nu ma'er ya [zhu][wei xinshimen she ge biyu], ta baochile ziji de zhenjie, suoyi, wo tongguo wo de jingshen [ji bu li lei tianshi] ba ta [er sa] chui ru ta de tinei, ta zhengshile ta de zhu de yanyu [an la chuangzao yi jian wu shi, zhi xu xialing shuo:“You!” Yushi jiu youle.] Que shi zhenli, ta chengxin ta [an la] de suoyou jingdian, ta shi fucong [an la] zhe.
Zansong zhangguan zhuquan [zhu] zhe [an la] zhifu! Ta dui wanshi shi wanneng de.
Ta chuangzaole si yu sheng, yibian ta kaoyan nimen shei de shangong zui hao [zhu]. Ta shi quanneng de, zui kuanshu de.
Ta chuangzaole qi ge xiangsi de tian. Ni [mu sheng] zai pu ci zhi zhu [an la] de chuangzao zhong kan bu chu renhe quexian. Ni zai kan kan, ni jiujing neng kan chu shenme liehen ne?
Ranhou, ni zai kan liang ci, ni de yanjing jiang hunhua, pijuan di zhuan huilai.
Wo que yi yong qunxing zhuangshi zuijin de tian, bing yi qunxing zuowei quzhu emomen de sheji wuqi. Wo wei tamen [emomen] zhunbeile liehuo de xingfa.
Bu xinyang tamen de zhu [an la] de ren bi shou huo yu de xingfa. Guisu zhen elie!
Dang tamen bei touru huo yu shi, tamen jiang tingjian feiteng de huo yu fachu lu ming ban de housheng.
Huo yu jihu yin fennu er baozha. Mei dang you yiqun ren bei touru qizhong, guanli huo yu zhe [tianshi] bian wen tamen:“Nandao meiyou renhe jinggao zhe jianglin nimen [bing quangao nimen] ma?”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Juedui you! You wei jinggao zhe que yi lailin women, dan women fouren ta bing shuo:“An la meiyou jiang shi renhe qishi, nimen zhishi zai ji da de mi wu zhong.”
Tamen hai jiang shuo:“Yaoshi women ceng tingcong huo mingli, women jiu buzhi chengwei huo yu de fanrenle.”
Tamen jiang chengren ziji de zuiguo, suoyi,[nimen] dang yuanli huo yu de fanren.
Fan anzhong weiju tamen de zhu de ren, tamen jiang huode kuanshu he zhongda de baochou [leyuan].
Wulun nimen mimitanhua haishi gongkai tanhua, ta [an la] dique quanzhi [renlei] xiongzhong de yiqie.
Nandao chuangzao zhe [an la] bu zhidao [nimen de mi tan] ma? Ta shi zui minrui de, che zhi de.
Shi ta [an la] wei nimen er shi dadi chengwei youyi de [bianyu nimen yishizhuxing ji nongzuowu shengzhang deng], yin'er nimen ke zai dadishang sichu xingzou, ke chi ta de jiyang. Fuhuo zhi gui ta.
Nandao nimen you bawo tianshang de zhu [an la] bu hui shi da di zai zhendong shi tunmo nimen ma?
Nandao nimen you bawo tianshang de zhu [an la] bu hui jiang fei shazou shi de baofeng xiji nimen ma?[Na shi] nimen jiang zhidao wo de jinggao duo kepa!
Tamen de qian ren que yi fourenguo [wo de jinggao]. Wo de xingfa duo kepa!
Nandao tamen meiyou kanjian zai tamen shangmian zhan suo shuangyi feixiang de niao lei ma? Wei pu ci zhi zhu [an la] caineng kongzhi tamen [pingheng feixing]. Ta dui wanshi wanwu que shi quan shi de.
Chu pu ci zhi zhu wai, shei neng yi dajun yuanzhu nimen ne? Bu xinyang zhe zhishi zai zi qi zhi zhong.
Jiaru ta [an la] tingzhi ta [suo tigong] de jiyang, shei neng gongji nimen jiyang ne? Bu, tamen yizhi shi aoman he panni de.
Shi qushen er xingzhe geng neng huode yindao ne? Haishi zai zhengdao [yisilan jiao] shang angshoukuobu zhe geng neng huode yindao?
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Shi ta [an la] chuangzao nimen, bing ci gei nimen er [tingjue] mu [shijue] xin [siwei], dan nimen hen shao gan'en.”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Shi ta shi nimen zai da dishang fanyan,[houshi] nimen dou jiang bei jihe dao ta nali qu.”
Tamen shuo:“Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe, zhege jinggao [fuhuo ri] he shi shixian ne?”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wei an la zhidao zhege zhishi [zhu], wo zhishi yi wei tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
[Fuhuo ri] dang tamen kanjian ta [xingfa] linjin shi, bu xinyang zhe de lian jiang bian de yin'an [beishang]. You hua sheng [dui tamen] shuo:“Zhe jiushi nimen ceng yaoqiu shixian de [xingfa].”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Jiaru an la yu huimie wo he wo de zhuisui zhe, huo ci min women, name, shei neng zhengjiu bu xinyang zhe tuoli tongku de xingfa ne?”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Ta shi pu ci zhi zhu [an la], women xinyang ta, women xinlai ta. Nimen bujiu jiang zhidao shei shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Jiaru nimen de shui shen lou wanliao, shei neng ci gei nimen liutang de quanshui ne?”
Nu nai [alabo yu yige zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi]. Yi bi he tamen [tianshi zai gongguo bu zhong] suo jilu de fa shi!
Yi ni de zhu de enhui fashi! Ni [mu sheng] jue bushi fengzi.
Ni bi jiang huode yongheng de baochou.
Ni dique juyou weida de pinde.
Ni bujiu jiang kanjian, tamen bujiu ye jiang kanjian,
nimen zhong shei shi fengzi.
Ni de zhu dique zui zhidao shei mishile ta [an la] de dao [yisilan jiao], ye zui zhidao shei shi zunxing zhengdao zhe.
Ni buyao fucong fouren zhe [fouren yisilan jiao, mu sheng he “gulanjing”].
Tamen xiwang ni [zai yisilan jiao shang xiang tamen] tuoxie, yibian tamen ye [xiang ni] tuoxie.
Ni buyao fucong mei ge chang fashi zhe——zhe zhong fashi shi hao wu jiazhi de [zhu],
feibang zhe, sichu zaoyao zhe,
linse zhe [huo fang'ai xingshan zhe], guofen zhe [chaoyue fadu zhe], fanzui zhe,
Canbao zhe, ciwai, hai you sishengzi.
[Zhe shi] yinwei ta yongyou caifu he ernu.
Dang youren xiang ta songdu wo de qishi shi, ta shuo:“Zhe zhishi qian ren de fengsu xiguan eryi.”
Wo jiang zai ta de bizi shang dashang laoyin.
Wo bi jiang kaoyan tamen, youru wo ceng kaoyan guoyuan de renmen yiyang. Dangshi, tamen [guoyuan de renmen] fashi tamen jiang zai [ci ri] zaochen caizhai yuan zhong de guozi,
dan tamen meiyou shuo:“Yin sha an la [jiaru an la yiyu]!”
Suoyi, dang tamen [yeli] zheng shushui shi, guoyuan zaoshoule cong ni de zhu jiang shi de huozai [bing shaohuile].
Qingchen, guoyuan bian chengle yipian jiaotu.
Zaochen, tamen huxiang hanjiao:
“Jiaru nimen yao caizhai [nimen de guozi], nimen ying zai zaochen dao nimen de guoyuan qu.”
Yushi tamen bian chufale,[tuzhong] tamen di sheng shangyi shuo:
“Jintian buyao rang renhe pinmin jinru yuan zhong darao nimen.”
Tamen zaochen [xinxin baibei de zhunbei] jinru guoyuan,[tamen] yiwei tamen you nengli zuzhi [pinmin jinru guoyuan caizhai guozi].
Dang tamen kanjian guoyuan shi, tamen cai shuo:“Women dique mi wule,
bu, women [de shuiguo] bei boduole.”
Tamen zhong zui youxiu de ren shuo:“Nandao wo meiyou gaosuguo nimen ma? Nimen weisheme bu shuo “yin sha an la [jiaru an la yiyu] ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Zanmei women de zhu chaojue! Women que shi bu yi zhe.”
Yushi, tamen bici zou lai, huxiang zhize.
Tamen shuo;“women zhen gaisi! Women que shi beini zhe.
Women de zhu yexu hui ci gei women yige bi zhe geng hao de guoyuan. Women dique gui xin women de zhule [women kewang shan bao, kewang ta kuanshu women de zui'e, qie zai houshi ci gei women baochou].”
Zhe jiushi [jinshi de] xingfa, dan houshi de xingfa cai shi zuida de, jiaru tamen zhidao.
Jingwei zhe zai tamen de zhu nali bi jiang huode enze de leyuan.
Nandao wo duidai musilin [guishun zhe] yu duidai fanzui zhe shi yiyang de ma?
Nimen zenme la? Nimen shi zenyang panduan de?
Nandao nimen youyi bu ke gong nimen xuexi de jingdian,
nimen dique ke cong na bu jingdian zhong huode nimen suo xuanze de yiqie ma?
Nandao nimen yu wo dingle dao fuhuo ri cai man qi de shiyue, er nimen bi jiang huode nimen suo panduan de ma?
Ni wen wen tamen ba! Tamen shei neng wei ci danbao ne?
Nandao tamen you “xuduo huoban [zhuzai]” ma? Jiaru tamen shi chengshi zhe, rang tamen ba tamen de “huobanmen [zhuzai]” zhao lai ba!
Dang zainan jianglin, tamen bei zhao qu koubai [an la] di na ri [fuhuo ri], tamen [wei xinzhe] jiang wunengweili [zhu].
Tamen de muguang xiachui, xiuru longzhaozhe tamen.[Zhe shi yinwei] tamen [zai chenshi] jianquan shi, tamen chang bei zhao qu koubai [an la, ru libai, dan tamen bu yuanyi koubai an la].
Ni rang wo chengfa naxie fouren “gulanjing” de ren ba! Wo jiang zai tamen buzhi bu jue shi zhujian chengfa tamen.
Wo jiang zhanshi kuan yan tamen, wo de jihua que shi qiangda de.
Nandao ni [mu sheng] xiang tamen suoquguo [chuanjiao de] baochou, tamen yin nashui er fudan tai zhong ma?
Nandao tamen yongyou wei jian zhi wu [ci chu te zhi tian jing——“shou baohu de xian pai”], yin'er tamen neng jilu xialai ma?
Ni dang naixin dengdai ni de zhu de panjue [zhu], ni buyao xiang na yu de huoban yiyang: Dangshi, ta [yu de huoban] feichang beishang de [gao sheng] qiqiu ta de zhu.
Yaoshi cong ta de zhu jiang shi de enhui meiyou daoda ta, name,[ta biding liu zai yu fu zhong, dan wo kuanshule ta], ta bi shou qianze di bei reng dao guangtutu de an bian.
Ranhou, ta de zhu xuanze ta bing shi ta chengwei shanren zhi yi.
Bu xinyang zhe tingjian jiaohui [“gulanjing”] shi, tamen [zengwu “gulanjing”] de muguang jihu shi ni diedao. Tamen shuo:“Ta [mu sheng] que shige fengzi.”
Zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi dui zhong shijie de yi xiang jiaohui.
Zhenshi de [ru fuhuo ri]!
Zhenshi de shi shenme?
Ni zen neng zhidao zhenshi de shi shenme?
Sa mu de ren he a de ren ceng fouren da nan [shenpan shi de qiao zhong sheng].
Zhiyu sa mu de ren, yi bei kongbu de jiaohan sheng suo huimie;
zhiyu a de ren, yi bei nuhou de kuangfeng suo huimie.
Ta [an la] ceng shi kuangfeng xiang tamen lianxu guale qiye ba tian, ni kanjian renmen bei gua dao zai dishang [bei huimie], tamen haoxiang kongxin de ye zao shugan yiyang.
Ni kanjian tamen hai you yicun de ma?
Falao he zai ta [falao] zhiqian de renmen, yiji bei dianfu de chengshi de renmin [ru lu te shengren suo ju chengshi de renmin] ceng fanzui.
Tamen weikang tamen de zhu de shizhe, suoyi, ta yanli chengfale tamen.
[Nu ha shengren shidai] dang hongshui fanlan shi, wo rang nimen [nu ha shengren ji qi zhuisui zhe] chengzuo zai [nu ha shengren zhizao de] chuan zhong,
yibian wo shi ta chengwei dui nimen de yi zhong jiaohui, yibian lingmin de er [ren] neng [tingjian bing] lijie.
Dang haojiao [di yici] yi chui xiang,
dadi he qun shan bei yi kai, bici pengzhuang yi ci shi,
zai na ri, na dashi jiang fasheng,
tian jiang polie. Zai na ri, tian shi cuiruo de [jiang lie cheng suipian].
Tianshimen jiang zai tian de ge bian. Zai na ri, zai tamen de shangmian jiang you ba wei tianshi taizhe ni de zhu de baozuo [zhu].
Zai na ri, nimen jiang bei dai chu [shoushen], nimen meiyou renhe mimi ke yinman.
Zhiyu gongguo bu di gei youshou zhe, ta jiang shuo:“Nimen na wo de gongguo bu qu nian ba!
Wo [zai chenshi shi yi] quexin wo bi jiang yujian wo de zhang mu.”
Ta jiang zai yukuai de shenghuo zhong,
zai yige gaoji leyuan zhong,
yuan li de shuiguo shenshou ke zhai.
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Nimen yukuai di chihe ba! Yinwei nimen zai guoqu de suiyue li [xinyang bing] xingshan.”
Zhiyu gongguo bu di gei zuoshou zhe, ta jiang shuo:“Yaoshi wo de gongguo bu bu di gei wo duo hao a!
Yaoshi wo bu zhidao wo de zhang mu duo hao a!
Yaoshi [zai chenshi de] siwang neng jieshu wo de yisheng duo hao a!
Wo de caifu dui wo wuyile,
wo de quanli cong wo de zhangwo zhong xiaoshile.”
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Nimen zhua zhu ta, gei ta dai shang jiaoliao;
ranhou, nimen ba ta reng jin liehuo zhong qu;
ranhou, nimen yong yi gen qishi bi zhang de lianzi shuan zhu ta.”
Zhe shi yinwei ta [zai chenshi shi] bu xinyang weida de an la,
bu quanmian renmen jipin [zhu].
Yinci, jintian ta zai zheli meiyou renhe pengyou,
chu [shangkou liuchu de] nong zhi wai, ta meiyou renhe shiwu [ke chi],
zhiyou zui rencai chi na nong zhi.
Wo yi nimen kan de jian de yiqie fashi,
yi nimen kan bujian de yiqie fashi,
zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi yi wei zungui shizhe [ji bu li lei tianshi huo mu sheng zhuanshu] de yanci,
zhe bushi yi wei shiren de yanci, dan nimen hen shao xinyang.
Zhe ye bushi yi wei zhanbu zhe de yanci, dan nimen hen shao jieshou quangao.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi congzhong shijie zhi zhu jiang shi de.
Jiaru ta [mu sheng] jie wo [an la] de mingyi niezao yixie huangyan,
wo bi yi quanli chengzhi ta,
ranhou, wo bi geduan ta de zhu dongmai,
nimen zhong jue meiyou ren neng zuzhi wo chengfa ta.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi dui jingwei zhe de jiaohui.
Wo dique zhidao nimen zhong shei shi fouren [“gulanjing”] zhe.
[Fuhuo ri], zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi bu xinyang zhe beitong [houhui] de quanyuan.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi juedui de zhenli.
Suoyi, ni dang zansong ni weida de zhu de zun ming.
You ge xunwen zhe xunwen jijiang jianglin bu xinyang zhe de xingfa, na shi wu ren neng kangju de,
na xingfa shi jiang zi an la——sheng xiao zhi lu de zhu de.
Tianshimen he jingshen [ji bu li lei tianshi] zai yi ri zhi nei shangsheng dao ta [an la] nali [zhu], na yi ri de changdu shi [chenshi suo jisuan de] wu wan nian.
Suoyi, ni [mu sheng] ying haohao rennai.
Tamen yiwei na xingfa shi hen yaoyuan de,
qishi, wo renwei na xingfa shi hen jin de.
Zai na ri, tian xiang tong shui,
shan xiang rongmao,
pengyou xiang jian bu xiang wen.

Jinguan tamen jiang bici xiang jian [fuhuo ri, mei ren dou jiang jian dao ziji de fumu, qizi, ernu he qinqi, dan ta buneng dui tamen jianghua, ye buneng xiang tamen xunqiu yuanzhu], dan fanzui zhe jiang yuanyi shu qu na ri de xingfa, jishi shi fengxian ziji de ernu,
qizi, xiongdi [jiemei],
shourong ta de qinqi,
yiji da dishang suoyou de yiqie, xiwang zhe neng zhengjiu ziji.
Jue bu keneng! Na [dengdai ta de] que shi huoyan de xingfa,
neng bo qu [shao wan] toupi,
neng zhaohui zhuanshen er tao de ren [bu xinyang zhe].
Ta [zhuanshen er tao de ren] juji caifu bing yincang [shoucainu, bu yuan wei an la zhi dao shiyong].
Ren que shi bei zaocheng jizao de,
dang ta zaoyu buxing shi, jiu fanzao [buman];
dang ta huode caifu shi, jiu linse [zhu],
Wei chang libai zhe liwai.
Tamen [chang libai zhe] shi chang jin shou bai gong de;
zai tamen de caichan zhong youyi xiang zhouzhi de fen'e,
na shi shishe gei qiqiu zhe he qiong er bu qiqiu zhe de [zhu];
tamen shi chengxin shenpan ri de;
tamen shi weiju tamen de zhu de xingfa de;
tamen de zhu de xingfa shi jue meiyou ren neng quebao qi anquan de;
tamen shi baochi zhencao de,
chufei shi dui tamen de qizi huo tamen suo yongyou de nunu nu fu, yinwei [zai zhe zhong qingkuang xia] tamen shi bu shou zebei de;
fan zai ci zhi wai zai you yaoqiu zhe, zhexie ren que shi guofen [chaoyue fadu] zhe;
tamen shi zunshou xintuo he mengyue de;
tamen shi binggong zuozheng de;
tamen shi jin shou bai gong de.
Zhexie ren zai leyuan li shi shou zunjing de.
Bu xinyang zhe zenme cheng qun jie dui jizhuo ting ni [mu sheng] suo yan er zai ni de zuoyou ne?[Tamen jizhuo ting ni suo yan, yibian fouren ni, chaoxiao ni he “gulanjing”].
Nandao tamen mei ren dou kewang jinru enze de leyuan ma?
Jue bu keneng! Wo que yi yong tamen suo zhidao de chuangzao tamen.
Wo yi suoyou dongfang he xifang [ji suoyou fangxiang] de zhu fashi, wo dique you nengli yi bi tamen geng hao de daiti tamen, wu ren neng chaoguo wo.
Yinci, ni rang tamen wang tan wanle ba! Zhidao tamen zaoyu tamen suo bei jinggao de rizi.
Zai na ri, tamen jiang cong fenmu zhong congmang ben chu, haoxiang ben xiang [saipao de] zhongdian yiyang,
tamen de muguang xiachui, xiuru longzhaozhe tamen. Zhe jiushi tamen suo bei jinggao de rizi.
Nu ha shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao zai dadishang liu xia yige bu xinyang zhe.
Jiaru ni liu xia tamen, tamen bi shi ni de pu renmen mi wu, tamen zhi shengyu beini zhe he wang'enfuyi zhe [zhu].
Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni kuanshu wo, wo de fumu, xinyang er jinru wojia zhong de ren, yiji nannu xinshimen; qiu ni zengjia dui bu yi zhe de huimie.”
Wo que yi paiqian nu ha qu jiaohua ta de zuren.[Wo dui ta shuo]:“Zai tongku de xingfa jianglin ni de zuren qian, ni dang jinggao tamen.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zuren a! Wo dui nimen que shi yi wei tanshuai de jinggao zhe.
Nimen dang chongbai an la, dang jingwei ta, dang fucong wo,
ta [an la] hui kuanshu nimen de zui'e, bing yanhuan nimen dao yige dingqi. Dang an la de dingqi lailin shi, jue buneng bei huanxing, jiaru nimen zhidao.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que yi zhouye zhaohuan wo de zuren [xinfeng yisilan jiao],
dan wo de zhaohuan que shi tamen gengjia taobi [zhenli].
Wo mei ci zhaohuan tamen, yibian ni kuanshu tamen shi, tamen zong ba shouzhi sai jin erduo, yong yifu zhe zhu ziji. Tamen wangu qie jiao'ao zi da.
Ranhou, wo gao sheng zhaohuan tamen,
ranhou, wo gongkai quandao tamen, ye sixia quandao tamen.”
Wo [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen dang qiu nimen de zhu [an la] kuanshu, ta que shi zui kuanshu de [zhu].
Ta [an la] jiang jiang gei nimen fengfu de yushui,
bing shi nimen de caifu he ernu zengduo, qie ci gei nimen yixie guoyuan he heliu.”
Nimen zenme [bu weiju an la de xingfa ye] bu kewang an la de baochou ne?
Ta que yi zai ji ge jieduan [zhu][shouxian shi jingye, ranhou shi ningxie, ranhou shi rou tuan……(jian 23:13-14)] Chuangzao nimen.
Nandao nimen meiyou kanjian an la zenyang chuangzao qi ge xiangsi de tian,
bing zai qizhong zao yueliang wei guangming, zao taiyang wei mingdeng ma?
An la shi nimen sheng yu dadi [ru renlei bei zao yu tu],
ranhou [si hou] you shi nimen fugui yu dadi, zuihou [fuhuo ri] you ba nimen quchu [fuhuo].
An la wei nimen er shi da di liaokuo,
yibian nimen zai da dishang zou kuankuo de daolu.
Nu ha shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Tamen que yi weikang wo, tamen zhuisui naxie qi caichan he ernu zhi gei tamen zengjia sunshi [huimie] de ren.
Tamen zhidingle yige da yinmou.
Tamen shuo:“Nimen jue buyao fangqi nimen de shenlingmen [ouxiang], nimen jue buyao fangqi wa de, su wa'er, ye wu si, ye ou ge he na si er [zhexie shi tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang ming].”
Tamen que yi [yong ouxiang] shi xuduo ren mi wu.“[An la a!] Qiu ni shi bu yi zhe gengjia mi wu.”
Tamen yin tamen de zui'e er bei yan si, ranhou jinru huo yu. Chu an la wai, tamen juedui zhao bu dao renhe yuanzhu zhe.
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo yi feng dao qishi: You yiqun jingling [san zhi shi ge] qingtingle [“gulanjing”]. Tamen shuo:“Women que yi tingjian qimiao de “gulanjing”,
ta dao ren yu zhengdao, suoyi, women yi xinyang ta, women [zai chongbai women de zhu shi] jue bu gei women de zhu [an la] shezhi renhe huoban.
Zansong women de zhu zhigao zhi gui, ta meiyou qizi, ye meiyou ernu.
Women zhong de yumei zhe [ru yi bu lisi huo jingling zhong de duoshenjiao tu] chang zaoyao wumie an la.
Women yuan yiwei renlei he jingling [zhu] jue bu hui zaoyao wumie an la.
Renlei zhong youxie nanren dique qiu nan jingling baohu [tamen], yin'er tamen [jingling] shi tamen [renlei] gengjia fanzui [he buxin].
Tamen dique xiang nimen yiyang wang cai an la jue bu hui [ji renlei huo jingling] paiqian renhe shizhele.
Women ceng shitu deng tian, dan women faxian tianshang bu manle weiyan de weishi he huoyan.
Women yiqian ceng zuo zai tianshang yixie ke zuo di difang qieting. Buguo, xianzai shei qieting, shei bian hui faxian you ge maifuzhe de huoyan zai jianshi ta.
Women zhen de bu zhidao shi da dishang de ren yao zaoyu buxing ne? Haishi tamen de zhu yu yindao tamen zunxing zhengdao?
Women zhong dique youxie shanren, ye youxie eren, women fen wei xuduo zongpai.
Women zhen de renwei women zai da dishang jue buneng taotuo an la de xingfa, jue buneng taobi an la de chengfa.
Dang women tingjian zhengdao [“gulanjing”] shi, women jiu xinyangle. Shei xinyang ta de zhu, shei jiu bupa kekou [shan bao], ye bupa zengjia [e bao].
Women zhong dique youxie musilin, ye youxie bu xinyang zhe [beili zhengdao zhe]. Shei chengwei musilin, zhexie ren yi xunqiu dao zhengdao [yisilan jiao].
Zhiyu bu xinyang zhe, tamen jiang shi huo yu de ranliao.”
Jiaru tamen [fei musilin] zunxing zhengdao [yisilan jiao], wo bi ci gei tamen fengfu de yushui,
yibian wo yi ci kaoyan tamen. Shei bi kai zan nian ta de zhu [ru fouren “gulanjing”, bu zunxing yisilan jiao jiaoyi jiaogui deng], ta [an la] jiang shi shei jinru [huo yu de] yanxing zhong.
Yiqie qingzhensi [libai di difang] dou shi an la de [zhu], suoyi, nimen buyao ji bai an la, you bai qita zhuzai.
Dang an la de puren [mu sheng zai libai zhong] zhanzhe qiqiu ta [an la] shi, tamen [jingling] juji zai ta [mu sheng] zhouwei, yige aizhe yige qingting [mu sheng songdu “gulanjing”].
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo zhi qiqiu wo de zhu [an la], wo jue bu gei ta shezhi renhe huoban.”

Ni shuo:“[Jiaru wo bu fucong an la], jue meiyou ren neng baohu wo mian shou an la de xingfa. Chu ta wai, wo jue buneng zhaodao renhe binan chu.
[Wo de zeren] zhishi chuanda an la de qishi he shiming [yisilan jiao]. Shei weikang an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], shei bi shou huo yu de xingfa, yong ju qizhong.
Deng tamen kanjian tamen suo bei jinggao de xingfa shi, tamen cai zhidao shei zai yuanzhu fangmian zui ruo, shei zai shumu fangmian zuishao.”
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo bu zhidao nimen suo bei jinggao de xingfa shi linjin de? Haishi wo de zhu [an la] yao wei ta guiding yige changyuan de qixian?”
[Ta] shi quanzhi yiqie wei jian zhi wu de zhu, ta bu hui xiang renhe ren xielou ta de wei jian zhi wu [de zhishi],
chufei shi tasuo tiaoxuan de [chuzi renlei de] shizhe,[an la yu gaosu ta duoshao wei jian zhi wu, jiu gaosu ta duoshao], bing pai yiqun jingwei zhe [tianshi] suihang yu ta [shizhe] de qianhou.
Yibian ta [an la] zhidao tamen [shizhe] que yi chuandale tamen de zhu [an la] de shiming. Ta [an la] zhouzhi tamen [shizhe] de yi yan yixing. Ta tongji wanwu de shumu [an la que zhi wanwu de shumu].
Guo [zai] yi [fu zhong] de ren [mu sheng] a!
Ni dang zai yeli qishen libai, chu shao bufen shijian wai,

Yeli qishen [libai] que shi jiannan de, dan ta shi zui youxiao de, shi zui neng kezhi ziji de, shi zui yi lijie an la zhi yan de [zhu].

Wo que yi paiqian yi wei shizhe [mu sheng] lai jiaohua nimen [renlei], wei nimen zuozheng, youru wo ceng paiqian yi wei shizhe [mu sa] qu jiaohua falao yiyang.
Dan falao weikangle na wei shizhe [mu sa], suoyi, wo yi yanxing chengzhile ta [falao].
Jiaru nimen bu xinyang, name, nimen zenyang fangbei jiang shi ertong bian cheng bai fa laoren di na ri [fuhuo ri] ne?
[Zai na ri], tian jiang yinci er benglie, ta [an la] de nuoyan shi yao shixian de.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi yi xiang jiaohui. Youzhi zhe ke zi ze yitiao tong xiang ta de zhu de dadao.

Ni de zhu dique zhidao ni [yeli] libai jihu zhan qule ye de san fen zhi er,[youshi shi] er fen zhi yi,[youshi shi] san fen zhi yi, gensui ni de ren zhong you yibufen ren ye ruci. An la yuding zhouye de changdu. Ta [an la] zhidao nimen buneng zheng ye libai, suoyi ta kuanshule nimen. Nimen dang songdu “gulanjing” zhong [nimen] rongyi lijie de jing wen. Ta zhidao nimen zhong youxie ren jiang huan bing, youxie ren jiang wei xunqiu an la de enhui er zai da dishang benbo, youxie ren jiang wei an la zhidao zhandou, suoyi nimen dang songdu “gulanjing” zhong [nimen] rongyi lijie de jing wen. Fanshi nimen wei ziji suo zuo de shangong, nimen jiang zai an la nali jian dao ta [de baochou], zhe shi zui hao de, zuida de baochou. Nimen dang qiu an la kuanshu. Guanli huo yu zhe, gong 19 wei tianshi.

Wo zhi pai tianshi zuo huo yu de guanli zhe, wo zhi yi tamen [tianshi] de shumu [19 wei] kaoyan bu xinyang zhe, yibian shi shou ci jingdian zhe [you jing ren] quexin [“gulanjing” shi zhenli, yu tamen suo yongyou de jingdian yizhi. na shi an la de pu renmen suo yinyong de yi gu quanshui, tamen jiang shi na gu quanshui daliang yong chu.

Wo que yi ba “gulanjing” xunxujianjin jiang gei ni [mu sheng],
yinci, ni dang naixin tingcong ni de zhu de panjue, ni buyao fucong tamen zhong de fanzui zhe he wang'enfuyi zhe.
Ni dang zai zaochen [chen li] he xiawu [shang li he bu li] zan nian ni de zhu de zun ming ③.
Yeli, ni dang yong shao bufen shijian koubai ta [zhu][hun li he xiao li], bingyong da bufen shijian zansong ta [ru li “te ha zhu de bai”(shenye libai)].
Zhexie ren [bu xinyang zhe] dique tanlian [duanzan de] jinshi shenghuo, tamen huluele chenzhong zhi ri de xingfa.
Wo chuangzao tamen, bing ci gei tamen qiangjian de tipo. Jiaru wo yiyu, wo jiang yong xiang tamen yiyang de ren lai chedi daiti tamen.

Yi jielian bei paiqian zhe [tianshi huo shizhe] fashi,
yi menglie chui dong de kuangfeng fashi,
yi qu yun xia yu de feng fashi,
yi fenbian zhen wei de [“gulanjing”] jing wen fashi,

Dang xingchen andan shi;
dangtian ti polie shi;

Zai panjue ri [shixian].

Wo ruci yuding. Wo shi duome zhuoyue de yuding zhe a!

Nimen qu jian yousan ge zhu de yin ying ba!”[Huo yu de yan zai shangsheng guocheng zhong jiang bian wei san zhu].
Na yin ying ji bu chansheng yinliang, ye buneng zhedang [huo yu de] lieyan.
Huo yu penshe chu gaolou ban de huohua,
na huohua haoxiang huangse de luotuo [huo kunbang de shengsuo].

Zhe shi tamen buneng shuohua zhi ri.
Tamen jiang de bu dao renhe xuke, yi zuo bianjie.
Zai na ri, fouren [fuhuo ri] zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Zhe shi panjue ri, wo jiang ba nimen he qian ren dou jihe qilai.
Jiaru nimen you jimou, nimen jiu yong jimou duifu wo ba!
Zai na ri, fouren [fuhuo ri] zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Jingwei zhe bi jiang zhu zai yin ying xia, quanshui pang,
[tamen jiang huode] tamen suo xiang chi de shuiguo.

Wo bi jiang ruci baochou xingshan zhe.
Zai na ri, fouren [fuhuo ri] zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
[You hua sheng dui bu xinyang zhe shuo]:“[Bu xinyang zhe a!] Nimen zhanshi [zai chenshi] chihe wanle ba! Nimen que shi fanzui zhe.”
Zai na ri, fouren [fuhuo ri] zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Dang youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen dang [libai] jugong [zhu]” shi, tamen bu jugong.
