na shi tamen chang zhenglun de.
Bu, tamen hen kuai jiu hui zhidao.
Bu, tamen hen kuai jiu hui zhidao.

shan zao ru mu zhuang ma?

Wo ba ye zao ru mu,
wo shi zhou gong [nimen] mousheng.

Huo yu dique zai denghou,
na shi panni zhe de guisu,
[tamen jiang] yong ju qizhong.
Tamen zai qizhong ji chang bu dao liangshuang [de kuaile], ye de bu dao shui he [jieke],
zhiyou ji re de feishui he ji leng de zang wu [ru nong zhi],
na shi yi xiang zhunque de baochou.
Tamen [zai chenshi shi] dique hushile qingsuan [zhu],
tamen chedi fouren wo de qishi.
Wo yi ba wanshi wanwu jilu zai yi bu tian jing zhong.
[Wo dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen changshi [zuo'e de jieguo] ba! Chule xingfa wai, wo jue bu gei nimen zengjia renhe dongxi.”
Jingwei zhe bi jiang huode chenggong,
[tamen zai leyuan li bi jiang huode] guoyuan he putao yuan,
rufang fengman, nianling xiangtong de shaonu [peiban],
yiji man bei de xian jiu.
Tamen zai leyuan li jiang ting bu dao hui yan he huanghua.
Zhe shi cong ni de zhu [an la] jiang shi de baochou, yi xiang chongzu de shangci.
[An la shi] tiandi wanwu de zhu, shi pu ci zhi zhu.[Fuhuo ri, wei jing ta xuke], renhe ren dou bu gan yu ta shuohua.
Dang jingshen [ji bu li lei tianshi] he tianshimen pai ban suli zhi ri, wei huode pu ci zhi zhu [an la] xuke zhe, cai gan shuohua, shuo shihua.
Zhe shi zhenshi de rizi. Youzhi zhe ke zi ze yige tong xiang ta de zhu de guisu [ru zai chenshi xinyang bing xingshan, zuo zhen xinshi].
Wo dique jinggaoguo nimen linjin de xingfa. Dang ren kanjian ziji [zai chenshi] qinshou suo zuo [shan e] di na ri [fuhuo ri], bu xinyang zhe jiang shuo:“Yaoshi wo yuan shi chentu duo hao a!”
Yi menglie che chu [bu xinyang zhe de linghun] zhe [tianshimen] fashi,
yi qingrou quchu [xinshi di linghun] zhe [tianshimen] fashi,
yi aoyou zhe [tianshimen huo xingchen] fashi,
yi zhengxian qianjin zhe [tianshimen huo xingchen] fashi,
yi shishi an la de mingling zhe [tianshimen] fashi.
Zai na ri [di yici haojiao chui xiang shi], dadi he qun shan jiang qianglie zhendong [mei ren dou jiang siwang],
di er ci haojiao jiang sui zhi chui xiang [mei ren dou jiang bei fuhuo].
Zai na ri, youxie xin jiang chandou bu'an,
youxie yan jiang bu gan yangshi.
Tamen shuo:“Women zhen de yao bei fuyuan cheng shengqian de zhuangtai ma?
Jishi women bian cheng xiu gu hou [ye neng fuhuo] ma?”
Tamen shuo:“Guozhen ruci, na shi yi ci kuisun de fuyuan.”
Zhi ting yisheng nahan [huo haojiao yi chui xiang],
Tamen turan faxian [tamen] si hou you huo zai dimian.
Mu sa de gushi daoda nile ma?
Dangshi, ta de zhu [an la] zai “tu wa” sheng guzhong zhaohuan ta [mu sa]:
“Ni qu jiaohua falao ba! Ta que shi panni zhe.”
Ni dui ta shuo:“Ni yuanyi [xidi ni de zui'e er] chengwei chunjie de ren ma?
Ni yuanyi wo yindao ni gui xin ni de zhu [an la], yibian ni weiju ta ma?”
Yushi ta [mu sa] xiang ta [falao] xianshile da jixiang.
Dan ta [falao] fouren bing weikang.
Ranhou, ta [falao] jimang zhuanshen zoule.
Ta jihe [le ta de renmin] bing hanjiao.
Ta shuo:“Wo jiushi nimen zuigao de zhuzai.”

Suoyi, an la yi ta [falao] zuihou de wangyan [ru ta shuo:“Wo jiushi nimen zuigao de zhuzai”(jian 79:24)] He zuichu de wangyan [ru ta shuo:“Zhong qing a! Chu wo wai, wo bu zhidao nimen hai you she me ke gong chongbai de zhuzai”(jian 28:38)] Chengfale ta [falao].
Dui weiju [an la de xingfa] zhe, ci zhong que youyi zhong jiaoxun.
Shi nimen geng nan zao ne? Haishi ta [an la] suo zao de tian geng nan zao?
Ta sheng qile tian de gaodu, bing shi ta wanshan.
Ta shi tian de ye bian cheng hei'an de, shi tian de zhou bian cheng guangming de.
Cihou, ta zhankai dadi.
Ta shi dadi yong chu quanshui, zhang chu mucao [zhiwu];
ta shi qun shan wengu,
gong nimen ji nimen de shengchu xiangyong.
Dang da nan [ru shenpan ri] lailin shi,
zai na ri, ren jiang xiangqi ziji [shengqian] suo zuo de shan e,
huo yu jiang wei neng kanjian zhe xianxian chulai.
Zhiyu panni zhe,
ta [ningyuan shuncong siyu er] xuanze jinshi shenghuo [zhu],
huo yu jiushi ta de guisu.
Zhiyu haipa zhan zai ta de zhu de qianmian [shoushen] bing ezhi siyu zhe,
leyuan jiushi ta de guisu.
Tamen wen ni [mu sheng] fuhuo de shijian he shi fasheng,
ni dui ta de fa sheng neng shuo shenme ne?
Wei ni de zhu zhidao ta he shi fasheng.
Ni [mu sheng] zhi neng jinggao weiju ta de ren.
Dang tamen kanjian ta di na ri, tamen haoxiang zhi [zai chenshi] douliule yi xi huo yi zhao.
Ta [mu sheng] zhouzhe meitou likaile,

yinwei you ge mangren lai jian ta [ci mangren xi mu sheng zhi qi haidi che jiufu de erzi——abu du la•ben•wu mu•maike tu mu. Mu sheng zheng xiang gu lai shen shouling xuanjiang jiaoyi shi, ta lai jian mu sheng].
Ni zen neng zhidao, yexu ta neng jinghua zishen [de zui'e]?
Huo jieshou quangao er shouyi ne?
Zhiyu ziman wu qiu zhe,
ni que guanzhu ta.
[Ruguo] ta bu jinghua zishen, yu ni wuguan.
Zhiyu xinku lai jian ni,
qie weiju [an la de xingfa] zhe,
ni que hushi ta.
Bu [ni buyao zheyang zuo], zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi yi xiang jiaohui.
Youzhi zhe ke chang jisong ta.
Ta [“gulanjing”] jilu zai zungui de, chonggao de, chunjie de tian jing [“shou baohu de xian pai”] zhong,
zai zungui de, zhongshun de jilu zhe [tianshi] de shouzhong.
Gaisi de ren [bu xinyang zhe]! Ta shi duome wang'enfuyi a!
Ta [an la] ceng yong shenme chuangzao ta [ren] ne?
Ta [an la] ceng yong yidi jingye chuangzao ta bing shi ta xiangchen [ru liangshou liang jiao, liang yan liang er deng].
Ranhou, ta [an la] shi ta rongyi zunxing zhengdao.
Ranhou, ta [an la] shi ta siwang bing shi ta ru fenmu.
Ranhou, dang ta [an la] yiyu shi, ta you shi ta fuhuo.
Bu, ta [ren] hai meiyou wancheng ta [an la] mingling ta de renwu.
Rang ren kan kan ziji de shiwu ba!
Wo jiangxia fengfu de yushui,
ranhou, wo shi dadi lie kai,
wo zai qizhong shengchan chu guwu,
putao, muxu [huo ganzhe],
ganlan, ye zao,
maosheng de guoyuan,
shuiguo he mucao,
gong nimen ji nimen de shengchu xiangyong.
Dang zhen'eryulong de han sheng [fuhuo ri di er ci haojiao chui xiang] lailin shi,
zai na ri, mei ren dou jiang taobi ziji de xiongdi [jiemei],
fumu,
qizi he ernu.
Zai na ri, tamen mei ren dou jiang zigubuxia.
Zai na ri, youxie mianmu jiang shi faguang de [zhen xinshi di mianmu],
xixiaoyankai.
Zai na ri, youxie mianmu jiang shi hui wu de,
hei'an longzhaozhe tamen,
zhexie ren jiushi bu xinyang zhe he xie'e zhe.
Dang taiyang andan [yun mie] shi,
dang xingchen moluo [yun mie] shi,
Dang qun shan bei yi kai shi,
dang huaiyun de mu tuo bei paoqi shi,
dang yeshou bei jihe shi,
dang haishui xiongxiong ranshao [huo fanlan] shi,
dang linghun [yu shenti chongxin] jiehe shi,
dang bei huomai de nu ying bei shenwen shi [zhu]:
Ta yin shenme zuiguo er bei sha?
Dang gongguo bu bei zhankai shi,
dangtian ti bei jie kai shi,
dang huo yu bei dianran shi,
dang leyuan bei dai jin shi,
mei ren dou jiang zhidao ziji [zai chenshi] suo zuo de shan e.
Wo yi yunxing shi de xingchen [ru xingchen baizhou xiaoshi, yewan chuxian] fashi,
yi yunxing he moluo shi de xingchen fashi,
yi xiaoshi shi de heiye fashi,
yi faguang shi de zaochen fashi,
zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi yi wei zungui de shizhe [ji bu li lei tianshi] chuanshou [gei mu sheng] de yanci,
ta [ji bu li lei tianshi] zai baozuo zhi zhu [an la] nali shi you quanli he diwei de,
shi zhide [tianshimen] fucong de,[zai tianshang] shi shouxin ren de.
[Renmen a!] Nimen de tongban [mu sheng] jue bushi fengzi.
Ta [mu sheng] que yi kanjian ta [ji bu li lei tianshi] zai [dongfang] qingxi di dipingxian shang,
ta dui [chuanshou] wei jian zhi wu de zhishi shi bu linse de.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] bushi bei fangzhu de emo de yanci.
Nimen yao wang nali qu ne?
Zhe [“gulanjing”] zhishi dui zhong shijie de yige jiaohui,
shi ci gei nimen zhong yuanyi zunxing zhengdao zhe de.
Chufei zhong shijie de zhu——an la yiyu, fouze, nimen jue bu hui zunxing zhengdao.
Dangtian ti lie kai shi,
dang xingchen sanluo shi,
dang haiyang baolie [ganku] shi,
dang fenmu bei zhen kai shi,
mei ren dou jiang zhidao ziji shengqian suo zuo de shan e he liu xia de shan e [dui hou ren de yingxiang].
Ren a! Shi shenme dongxi yinyou ni beili ni de renci de zhu [an la] ne?
Shi ta chuangzao ni bing shi ni xingxiang wanmei, yunchen.
Ta ba ni chuangzao cheng tasuo xihuan de xingzhuang.
Bu! Dan nimen fouren shenpan [shan jiang e fa].
Zai nimen de shangmian que you jianshi zhe [tianshimen],
[zai an la kan lai, zhexie jianshi zhe] shi zungui de, shi jilu [shan e] de [zhu],
tamen zhidao nimen suo zuo de yiqie.
Shan renmen bi zai enze [de leyuan] zhong,
erenmen bi zai huo yu zhong.
Shenpan ri, tamen [e ren] jiang bei reng ru huo yu [zhong shaozhuo],
tamen jue buneng likai huo yu.
Ni zen neng zhidao shenpan ri shi shenme?
Ni zen neng zhidao shenpan ri shi shenme?
Zai na ri, renhe ren dou wuneng wei renhe ren zuo renhe shi. Zai na ri, yiqie panjue, quan gui an la.
Cheng liang bugong zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Tamen shi: Dang tamen cong bieren nali cheng liang jin dongxi shi, ze cheng liang de chongzu;
dang tamen liang gei bieren huo cheng gei bieren shi, ze bu gei zu fenliang [zhu].
Nandao zhexie ren bu xiangxin tamen bi jiang zai zhongda zhi ri bei fuhuo [shoushen] ma?
Zai na ri, renlei jiang [quanbu] zhan zai zhong shijie zhi zhu [an la de] qianmian [shoushen].
Bu, e renmen de jilu bi zai e xing bu zhong.
Ni zen neng zhidao e xing bu shi shenme?
Na shi yi ben dengji bu.
Zai na ri, fouren [liu da xinyang] zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Yinwei tamen fouren shenpan ri.
Wei mei ge guofen zhe [chaoyue fadu zhe], fanzui zhe cai hui fouren ta.
Dang youren xiang ta songdu wo de qishi [“gulanjing”] shi, ta shuo:“Zhe zhishi qian ren de fengsu xiguan.”
Bu, er shi tamen suo fan de zui'e yi xiang xiuban yiyang mengbile tamen de xin.
Bu, zai na ri, tamen jiang bei zudang [geli], bude jian tamen de zhu.
Ranhou, tamen bi jiang bei reng ru huo yu [zhong shaozhuo].
Ranhou, you hua sheng [dui tamen] shuo:“Zhe jiushi nimen [zai chenshi] suo fouren de [xingfa].”
Bu, shan renmen de jilu bi zai shanxing bu zhong.
Ni zen neng zhidao shanxing bu shi shenme?
Na shi yi ben dengji bu,
jiejin an la de tianshimen keyi zuozheng ta.
Shan renmen bi zai enze [de leyuan] zhong,
kao zai bao yi shang guanwang.
Ni neng zai tamen de lian shang kan dao xingfu zhi guang.
Tamen jiang bei ci yin fengcun de xian jiu.
Na fengkou de shi shexiang. Rang kewang [huode zhexie] de renmen gankuai xingshan ba [zhu][ru quexin “liu da xinyang”, luxing “wuda gongxiu” deng]!
Na xian jiu shi “te si ni mu shui” de tiaozhi wu,
Na [te si ni mu shui] shi jiejin an la zhe suo yinyong de yi gu quanshui.
Fanzui de renmen [zai chenshi] dique chang chaoxiao xinshimen.
Dang xinshimen jingguo tamen shi, tamen bian jimeinongyan [chaoxiao].
Dang tamen hui dao ziji de jiaren nali shi, tamen bian zhigaoqiyang de huiqu.
Dang tamen kanjian xinshimen shi, tamen shuo:“Zhexie rencai shi mi wu de ren.”
Tamen [fanzui de renmen] meiyou bei pai qu zuo xinshimen de jianhu zhe.
Yinci, jintian [fuhuo ri] xinshimen jiang chaoxiao bu xinyang de renmen.
Tamen [xinshimen] kao zai bao yi shang guanwang [bing shuo]:
“Bu xinyang de renmen zaoshou tamen suo fanzui'e de huan baole ma?”
Dangtianti polie,
tingcong qi zhuming, bixu tingcong shi;
dang dadi zhankai,
pao chu qizhong de yiqie, bian cheng kongxu,
tingcong qi zhuming, bixu tingcong shi;
ren a! Ni dang wei ni de zhu [de dao] er nuli gongzuo, ni jiang huijian dao ziji xingwei de jieguo.
Fan gongguo bu di gei youshou zhe,
ta jiang shoudao jianyi de qingsuan,
ta jiang xinggaocailie de huiqu jian jiaren.
Fan gongguo bu cong beihou di gei zhe,
ta jiang jiaokuliantian,
ta jiang bei reng ru liehuo [zhong shaozhuo].
[Zai chenshi shi], ta zai ta de jiaren zhongyuan shi kuaile de,
ta dique caixiang ta jue bu hui gui dao ta de zhu nali qu.
Bu, ta de zhu dui ta que shi quan shi de.
Wo yi riluo shi de wanxia fashi,
yi ye ji qi suo yancang de fa shi,
yi yuanman shi de yueliang fashi,
nimen biding cong yige jieduan [jinshi] dao ling yige jieduan [houshi].
Tamen weihe bu xinyang ne?
Dang youren xiang tamen songdu “gulanjing” shi, tamen bu koutou [zhu]. Koutou chu
qishi, bu xinyang zhe shi fouren [zhu][an la, mu sheng,“gulanjing” he yisilan jiao deng] de.
An la zui zhidao tamen de xinzhong suo yincang de [shan e].
Yinci, ni dang xiang tamen xuanbu [tamen bi shou] tongku de xingfa.
Wei xinyang bing xingshan zhe liwai, tamen jiang huode yongheng de baochou [leyuan].
Yi you xing gong de tianti fashi,
yi jinggao de rizi [fuhuo ri] fashi,
yi jianzheng ri [ru zhu ma ri] he bei jianzheng ri [ru zhao jin qijian zhu ala fa te ri——yi li 12 yue 9 ri] fashi,
keng zhong de renmen gai zao huimie!
Na keng zhong you ranshaozhe de huo.
Dangshi, tamen jiuzuo zai keng bian,
tamen jianzheng ziji dui xinshimen suo fan de zui e [ru yong huoshao xinshimen].
Tamen huaihen tamen [xinshimen], zhi yin tamen [xinshimen] xinyang quanneng de, shou zansong de an la.
Tiandi de zhuquan que shi ta de. An la shi jianzheng wanshi wanwu de.
Fan pohai nannu xinshimen [ru kaowen bingyong huoshao xinshimen] er bu huizui zhe, tamen bi shou huo yu de xingfa, bi shou [huo yu li] shaozhuo de xingfa.
Fan xinyang bing xingshan zhe, tamen bi jiang huode zhu heliuguo de leyuan. Zhe shi weida de chenggong.
Ni de zhu [an la] de chengfa que shi yanli de.
Ta [an la] que yi chuangzao, bing jiang zai chuangzao [fuhuo].
Ta shi zui kuanshu de zhu, shi ren'ai de zhu,
shi baozuo de zhu, shi guangrong de zhu.
Ta yu zuo shenme, jiu zuo shenme.
Falao he sa mu de ren de jundui de gushi daoda nile ma?
Bu, bu xinyang zhe reng zai fouren [an la, mu sheng,“gulanjing” he yisilan jiao deng].
An la jiang cong ge fang baowei zhu tamen.
Bu, zhe shi yi bu guangrong de “gulanjing”,
jilu zai “shou baohu de xian pai” zhong.
Yi tian ti he qi mingxing fashi,
ni zen neng zhidao qi mingxing shi shenme?
Na shi canlan de mingxing,
mei ren dou youyi wei jianshi zhe [tianshi jianshi bing jilu ren de shan e].
Ren ying xiang yi xiang ziji shi yong shenme zaocheng de.
Ta shi yong yidi shechu de jingye zaocheng de,
na jingye shi cong ji gu he leigu jian liuchu de.
Ta [an la] dique neng shi ta [sizhe] fuhuo.
Zai na ri, yiqie yinmi zhi shi [ru shan e, bai gong, zhaijie deng] dou yao shou jianyan.
Ta [ren] wunengweili, ye meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe.
Yi fanfu jiangyu de yun fashi,
yi lie kai [rang zhiwu shengzhang] de dadi fashi,
zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi fenbian zhen wei de yanci,
zhe bushi xiyan.
Tamen dique gao yinmou [mouhai mu sheng],
wo yeyou jimou [duifu tamen de yinmou].
Yinci, ni [mu sheng] dang kuan yan bu xinyang zhe, ni dang zhanshi kuan yan tamen.
Ni dang zansong ni de zhigao zhu de zun ming.
Ta chuangzao wanwu bing shi zhi yunchen.
Ta yuding wanwu [de shuliang] bing jiayi yindao [ru yindao renlei bianbie zhen wei].
Ta shengchu mucao,
ranhou you shi ta bian cheng heise de kucao.
[Mu sheng a!] Wo jiang shi ni songdu [“gulanjing”], suoyi, ni jiang bu hui wangji,
chufei an la yiyu. Ta dique zhidao yiqie gongkai zhi shi he yincang zhi shi.
Wo jiang shi ni rongyi zunxing zhengdao.
Ni dang quangao [renlei], jiaru quangao [dui renlei] youyi.
Weiju [an la] zhe jiang jieshou quangao,
zui buxing zhe jiang bi kai quangao.
Ta [zui buxing zhe] jiang jinru [huo yu de] dahuo [zhong shaozhuo],
ranhou, ta zai qizhong ji bu hui si, ye buneng huo.
Fan jinghua zishen zhe [ru shi san kaizhai juan, yuan bi duo shen chongbai, xinfeng yisilan jiao deng] que yi chenggong,
ta [jinghua zishen zhe] zan nian ta de zhu de zun ming [ru nian chu an la wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu] bing jin shou bai gong.
Bu, nimen tanlian jinshi shenghuo,
jinguan houshi shi zui hao de, zui chijiu de.
Zhe que shi zai zai qian ren de jingdian zhong de,
ji zai zai yi bu la xin he mu sa de jingdian [“suhoufu”] zhong de.
Shibukedang de zainan [ru fuhuo ri] de xiaoxi daoda nile ma?
Zai na ri, youxie mianmu jiang shi xiuru de [zai huo yu li de bu xinyang zhe],
shi xinlao de, shi pibei de;
tamen jiang jinru liehuo [zhong shaozhuo];
tamen jiang bei [qiangpo] yin ji re de fei quan;
tamen meiyou shiwu, zhiyou han du duo ci de ku wu,
ta ji bu ziyang ren, ye bu jie ji'e.
Zai na ri, youxie mianmu jiang shi huanle de [zai leyuan li de xinshi],
shi wei ziji [zai chenshi] suo zuo de shangong gaoxing de.
[Tamen jiang zhu] zai gaoji leyuan li,
zai nali jiang ting bu dao e yan,
zai na li you liutang de qingquan,
zai na li you ke sheng gao de chuang,
you shenshou ke na de beizi,
you cheng pai de kaodian [kaozhen],
you pu kai jingzhi huali di ditan.
Nandao tamen meiyou guancha luotuo shi zenyang bei chuangzao de?
Tian shi zenyang bei sheng gao de?
Shan shi zenyang bei guding de?
Dadi shi zenyang bei zhankai de?
Ni [mu sheng] quangao ba! Ni zhishi yi wei quangao zhe,
ni bushi jiandu tamen de.
Dan beili qie bu xinyang zhe,
an la jiang yi zuida de xingfa chengzhi ta.
Tamen dou jiang gui dao wo [an la] zheli lai.
Ranhou, tamen de qingsuan biyou wo fuze.
Yi liming fashi,
yi shi ye [zhu][ru zhao jin yue de qian 10 ye] fashi,
yi oushu he jishu fashi,
yi xiaoshi shi de ye fashi,
dui you lizhi de renmen, nandao ci zhong [shangshu shiyan] hai meiyou zugou de zhengju ma?
Nandao ni [mu sheng] bu zhidao ni de zhu zenyang chengzhi a de ren——
ru gao zhu de yi la mu ren ma?
Zai qita difang hai meiyou bei chuangzaoguo zheyang [gao] de ren.
[Nandao ni bu zhidao ni de zhu zenyang chengzhi] zai shangu zhong zao shi wei wu de sa mu de ren,
yiji yongyou dajun de falao ma?
Tamen ceng zai guonei weifa luan ji,
zuo'eduoduan,
suoyi, ni de zhu jiang yanxing chengfa tamen.
Ni de zhu que shi jianshi [tamen de xingwei] de.
Zhiyu ren, dang ta de zhu ci gei ta rongyao he enhui er kaoyan ta shi, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu ci gei wo rongyaole.”
Dan dang ta suoxiao ta de shengji er kaoyan ta shi, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu lingru wole.”
Bu, shi nimen bu shandai gu'er [zhu][ru bu rang tamen zhenzheng xiangshou jichengquan],
shi nimen bu huxiang guli jipin [zhu],
shi nimen [tanlan de] tunshi bieren de yichan,
shi nimen guofen ku'ai caifu.
Bu, dang dadi wanquan zhen sui,
